job_title: Marketing Data Scientist/Analyst - Software - AI Marketing Software Start-Up
job_text: ['', 'Expert in Math (linear algebra, calculus, and probability), Statistics (hypothesis testing and summary statistics), Data visualization (BI, Looker, Google Sheets/Cloud) and reporting techniquesProfessional with skills in Data mining, Data cleaning and mungingProfessional skills in programming (SQL databases, R, Python)Exposure to cloud-based data platforms, ideally BigQueryExperience with ML tools and techniques (k-nearest neighbors, random forests, ensemble methods)Sophisticated with analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methods and quick with preparing data for use in predictive and prescriptive modelingA self-starter that is not afraid to dig in and show initiative, to find creative solutions to problems and bring to the Director of Value CreationExperience with marketing data, metrics and KPIs\xa0would be an ideal but not essential', "Orama are proud to announce their exclusive partnership with an AI Marketing Software Start-up who are tipped to be one of the biggest success stories of 2021. Their unique value proposition allows enterprise companies to understand and predict their customers' buying habits/patterns combining data gained from omnichannel marketing tech with the latest machine learning advances. Following their recent addtion of $40m+ round of funding, they are looking to hire a Data Science specialist who can help create value within their largest customers by deriving insights from data. This is a unique opportunity to play a pivotal role in their growth - GET IN TOUCH NOW!", 'Experience with ML tools and techniques (k-nearest neighbors, random forests, ensemble methods)', 'Professional with skills in Data mining, Data cleaning and munging', 'Professional skills in programming (SQL databases, R, Python)', "Working with the Director of Value Creation, you will be responsible for deriving insights from specific customer data; helping them to be as successful as possible at predicting their customer's purchasing behaviour whilst also driving our ability to build effective business cases to increase our revenue stream with our customers themselves.", 'Exposure to cloud-based data platforms, ideally BigQuery', 'You will proactively research, explore and examine data from a variety of angles to determine hidden weaknesses, trends and/or opportunities.', 'A self-starter that is not afraid to dig in and show initiative, to find creative solutions to problems and bring to the Director of Value Creation', 'Marketing Data Scientist/Analyst - Software - AI Marketing Software Start-Up', '.', 'Your role is incredibly data driven, whether that be understanding natural language, analysing trends or determining which of our products is best suited to a user - we have interesting problems to solve on an ever-increasing scale.\xa0', 'Desired Skills and Experience', 'You will build new tools to automate work or provide real-time reporting systems.', 'Expert in Math (linear algebra, calculus, and probability), Statistics (hypothesis testing and summary statistics), Data visualization (BI, Looker, Google Sheets/Cloud) and reporting techniques', 'Basic $100K-150K + bonus + Stock + Benefits', 'In order to apply for this role you will have the following experience:', 'Is able to translate numerical data into visual representations that convey a business-focus to our customers.', "Working with the Director of Value Creation, you will be responsible for deriving insights from specific customer data; helping them to be as successful as possible at predicting their customer's purchasing behaviour whilst also driving our ability to build effective business cases to increase our revenue stream with our customers themselves.Your role is incredibly data driven, whether that be understanding natural language, analysing trends or determining which of our products is best suited to a user - we have interesting problems to solve on an ever-increasing scale.\xa0You will proactively research, explore and examine data from a variety of angles to determine hidden weaknesses, trends and/or opportunities.You will build new tools to automate work or provide real-time reporting systems.Is able to translate numerical data into visual representations that convey a business-focus to our customers.", 'Experience with marketing data, metrics and KPIs\xa0would be an ideal but not essential', 'Sophisticated with analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methods and quick with preparing data for use in predictive and prescriptive modeling']

['The Quantitative Research Analyst will be responsible for… ', 'Title: Quantitative Research Analyst ', 'Bachelor’s, Master’s, or PhD degree in mathematics, engineering, science, finance, or business 10+ years of quantitative research experience, either multi asset class or single asset class Computer science minor or equivalent programming experience Strong working knowledge of data analytics languages (R or Python) and relational databases Strong interpersonal skills and a real passion for working in a team environment ', 'Leading research in strategic design and active allocation from inception to implementation ', '\xa0Salary: $400,000-$600,000 ', 'Understand, maintain, and improve infrastructure supporting investment process ', 'The Quantitative Research Analyst should have the following qualifications: ', 'Build robust quantitative tools to aid all aspects of portfolio construction ', 'Bachelor’s, Master’s, or PhD degree in mathematics, engineering, science, finance, or business ', '\xa0 ', 'In addition to that, you’ll develop and evaluate innovative systematic strategies, improve frameworks for global tactical asset allocation, and refine our tools for outcome-driven portfolio construction. ', 'Salary:', 'The Quantitative Research Analyst should have the following qualifications:', 'If you are interested in the Quantitative Research Analyst role, then please don’t wait to apply. ', 'Computer science minor or equivalent programming experience ', 'Present research to key stakeholders; publish thought leadership and whitepapers in leading journals ', 'Title:', 'Explain complex quantitative concepts to non-technical people; mentor other quantitative analysts ', '\xa0', 'If you find yourself to have strong quantitative, programming and database skills with the ability to think analytically, communicate clearly and work collaboratively, please reach out to learn more. ', 'Strong working knowledge of data analytics languages (R or Python) and relational databases ', 'Strong interpersonal skills and a real passion for working in a team environment ', 'Monitor, measure, and attribute portfolio risks and returns ', 'A multi-billion dollar asset management firm is currently seeking an enthusiastic and motivated Quantitative Analyst to join their core research group in Boston. As apart of the quantitative research group, you’ll play a key role in providing research and analysis to portfolio managers and other investment professionals in support of our broad range of investment solutions.  ', 'The Quantitative Research Analyst will be responsible for…', '10+ years of quantitative research experience, either multi asset class or single asset class ', 'Leading research in strategic design and active allocation from inception to implementation Build robust quantitative tools to aid all aspects of portfolio construction Understand, maintain, and improve infrastructure supporting investment process Monitor, measure, and attribute portfolio risks and returns Explain complex quantitative concepts to non-technical people; mentor other quantitative analysts Present research to key stakeholders; publish thought leadership and whitepapers in leading journals ']

job_title: Research Scientist - Cell Biology, Oncology Small Molecule Drug Discovery
job_text: ['Leverage expertise, delve into the literature or reach out to thought leaders to identify key scientific questions related to target biology, then devise/execute experiments to answer these questions ', 'Ability to design and execute experiments with a high degree of rigor and independence ', 'Requirements:', 'PhD with a minimum of 2 years of post-doctoral experience in the field of cell biology and/or cancer with a strong publication record in top-tier journals ', 'Proficiency in standard cell-biology techniques such as Western blotting, ELISAs, cell proliferation, fluorescent microscopy and flow cytometry ', 'Provide strategic and/or technical support to various project teams as necessary ', 'Contribute to written and oral presentations for both internal and external purposes ', 'EnLiven Therapeutics is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status.', '\xa0 ', 'Expertise in genetic manipulation of cells such as transient transfection, viral transduction, stable cell line generation, CRISPR and shRNA-mediated gene knockdown ', 'Mentor junior scientists within the organization ', 'EnLiven Therapeutics does not accept resumes from recruitment agencies for this position. Recruiters, please do not send resumes to EnLiven employees or to the company location. EnLiven is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.', 'Analyze and interpret resultant data in a highly rigorous fashion to inform on the design of follow-on experiments to further refine our understanding of target biology and guide future strategic direction ', 'Research Scientist - Cell Biology, Oncology Small Molecule Drug Discovery ', 'HR@enliventherapeutics.com', 'Assist in the development and running of quantitative cell-based assays to support drug discovery projects ', 'Ability to work in a fast-paced, highly collaborative environment with flexibility and a willingness to take on new challenges ', 'Leverage expertise, delve into the literature or reach out to thought leaders to identify key scientific questions related to target biology, then devise/execute experiments to answer these questions Analyze and interpret resultant data in a highly rigorous fashion to inform on the design of follow-on experiments to further refine our understanding of target biology and guide future strategic direction Assist in the development and running of quantitative cell-based assays to support drug discovery projects Provide strategic and/or technical support to various project teams as necessary Contribute to written and oral presentations for both internal and external purposes Share expertise with organization, particularly in a mentoring/teaching capacity ', 'PhD with a minimum of 2 years of post-doctoral experience in the field of cell biology and/or cancer with a strong publication record in top-tier journals Ability to design and execute experiments with a high degree of rigor and independence Strong experience in tissue culture techniques including primary and established cell lines, 2D and 3D culture Well-versed in a variety of molecular biology techniques including DNA/RNA purification, PCR and RT-PCR. Expertise in genetic manipulation of cells such as transient transfection, viral transduction, stable cell line generation, CRISPR and shRNA-mediated gene knockdown Proficiency in standard cell-biology techniques such as Western blotting, ELISAs, cell proliferation, fluorescent microscopy and flow cytometry Strong computer skills including MS Office (Excel, Word and PowerPoint) as well as basic statistical analysis software (e.g. PRISM, ExcelFit) Mentor junior scientists within the organization Ability to work in a fast-paced, highly collaborative environment with flexibility and a willingness to take on new challenges ', 'Summary:', 'To apply for this position, please send your CV/Resume to: ', '\xa0', 'Strong computer skills including MS Office (Excel, Word and PowerPoint) as well as basic statistical analysis software (e.g. PRISM, ExcelFit) ', 'This role is an excellent opportunity for a motivated and energetic scientist to not only apply their expertise in cell biology and cancer but also to gain valuable experience in the fundamentals of small molecule drug discovery as we advance our targeted therapies from the lab into the clinic.  The candidate will be directly responsible for elucidating the biology around our targets to confirm their therapeutic utility and inform on a clinical strategy.  These efforts include the design and execution of experiments (biochemical and cell-based) to validate the therapeutic relevance of specific mechanisms of action, identify or confirm target patient populations, predict potential mechanisms of resistance and evaluate drug combination opportunities. ', 'To apply for this position, please send your CV/Resume to: HR@enliventherapeutics.com ', 'Primary Responsibilities: ', 'Share expertise with organization, particularly in a mentoring/teaching capacity ', 'Well-versed in a variety of molecular biology techniques including DNA/RNA purification, PCR and RT-PCR. ', 'Primary Responsibilities:', 'Strong experience in tissue culture techniques including primary and established cell lines, 2D and 3D culture ', 'Requirements: ', 'EnLiven Therapeutics is proud to be an equal opportunity employer and does not discriminate on the basis of age, race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability or any other legally protected status. ', 'Summary: ']

['', ' You work with confidence and without ego. Our data scientists have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates.', ' You have an abundance of intellectual curiosity and are enthusiastic to learn (and teach) new technologies / techniques.', ' You have experience with big data technologies such as Spark or AWS; are able to write efficient SQL; and are proficient in one or more of the following programming languages: R, Python, Java, or Scala. Variety of technical challenge is one of the best things about working at The Trade Desk as a data scientist though which is why we do not expect you to know every technology we use when you start. What we care about is that you can learn quickly and solve complex problems using the best tools for the job.', ' You are a broadly skilled data scientist with experience embedding models into always-on production systems, working across a variety of technologies and data sources.', ' Lead Senior Data Scientists serve both as technical individual contributors and people managers. You will be responsible for owning a technical area as well as building and nurturing a team.', 'WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING:', ' You are you comfortable working on an agile, distributed team spanning multiple time zones and continents.', " You have a sustained track record of making significant, self-directed, and end-to-end contributions to large and impactful machine learning projects. You think beyond just the task at hand to deeply understand the 'why' behind what you are doing.", " You have a strong sense of data intuition. At our scale, many off-the-shelf modeling techniques (open source and enterprise) simply don't work. You are able to work from first principles and intuition to develop solutions and adapt them to a unique environment.", 'WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR:', ' You are a creative thinker, not bound by "the way things have always been done." What you know is less important than how well you learn and innovate. We don\'t need data scientists who know all the answers; we need data scientists who can invent the answers no one has thought of yet, to the questions yet to be asked.', ' You value, seek out, and foster diversity. We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground.', 'WHAT YOU BRING TO THE TABLE:', ' Lead Senior Data Scientists are end-to-end owners. You will participate actively in all aspects of designing, researching, building, and delivering data-focused products for our clients.', ' You are able to communicate effectively across both technical and non-technical audiences.', ' You are a driver. You will be driving technical projects and providing leadership in a ground-breaking and fast-paced environment. This includes task planning and conducting code reviews, as well as individual code contribution.', ' You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making.', ' You have over 10 years of experience working in a data-driven role, including leading large and impactful technical projects. You may have an advanced degree in a quantitative field, but it’s not a requirement. What and how you can contribute is what’s most important to us which is why our consideration is not limited by the level of education you have.', 'WHO WE ARE:', ' Our Data Science team is embedded into nearly a dozen individual, mission-focused engineering teams working across a wide spectrum of technological and scientific challenges. You will have the opportunity, depending on your interests and background, to own problems related to natural language processing and machine learning over hundreds of millions of web pages, graph mining and algorithmic optimization on petabytes of data, and causal inference with missing data - to name a few.', ' Lead Senior Data Scientists contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring, technical leadership, and direct people-management, they make others better and raise the bar for those around them.']

job_title: Staff Data Scientist - Activision Blizzard Media
job_text: ['', 'Mine and analyze data to improve product capabilities and help the team to come up with new products.', 'Experience using machine learning libraries or platforms, including Tensorflow, Caffe, Theanos, Scikit- Learn,or ML Lib for production or commercial products.', 'Ability to communicate effectively between Product managers, business teams, data analysts and production engineers, both in code and conversation.', 'Experience working with AWS or Google Cloud Platform (GCP).', 'Experience of working with advertising platform.', 'Identify new data sources and features and collects large data sets to build new models.', 'Level Up - Your Role With Activision Blizzard Media', 'Job Description', 'Strong adherence to metrics driven development, with a disciplined and analytical approach to product development.', 'PhD or MS in computer science, engineering or related field.', 'Ready to Play? Apply now!', 'Game Changer - What You Bring To The Role', 'Experience in stream processing—Storm, Spark, Flink etc.— and graph processing technologies.', 'Work as the lead data strategist to help identify compelling patterns and advise the solutions.', 'Experience in finding patterns, trends and actionable insights from huge data sets.', 'You have expertise in one or more object- oriented languages, including Python, Go, Java, or C++, and an eagerness to learn more', 'Experience with distributed storage and database systems, including SQL or NoSQL, MySQL, or Cassandra.', 'A strong desire to learn the details of advanced machine learning algorithms.', 'Ability to solve complex business problems and apply machine learning to optimize critical business metrics.', ' Work as the lead data strategist to help identify compelling patterns and advise the solutions. Mine and analyze data to improve product capabilities and help the team to come up with new products. Identify new data sources and features and collects large data sets to build new models. Aggregate huge amounts of data and information from large numbers of sources to discover patterns and features necessary to build machine learning models for prediction and forecasting. Design and implement end- to- end solutions using Machine Learning, Optimization, and other advanced computer science technologies, and own live deployments to drive advertising conversion. Improve the run- time of existing algorithms. Develop and maintain the necessary infrastructure to run and maintain the algorithms.Develop a feedback system to improve the selection of features for the algorithms. ', ' PhD or MS in computer science, engineering or related field. Experience in finding patterns, trends and actionable insights from huge data sets. 10 years of experience as machine learning engineer / data scientist. You have expertise in one or more object- oriented languages, including Python, Go, Java, or C++, and an eagerness to learn more Experience with both machine learning and building scalable production services. Experience with distributed storage and database systems, including SQL or NoSQL, MySQL, or Cassandra. Experience using machine learning libraries or platforms, including Tensorflow, Caffe, Theanos, Scikit- Learn,or ML Lib for production or commercial products. A strong desire to learn the details of advanced machine learning algorithms. Ability to communicate effectively between Product managers, business teams, data analysts and production engineers, both in code and conversation. Ability to solve complex business problems and apply machine learning to optimize critical business metrics. Strong adherence to metrics driven development, with a disciplined and analytical approach to product development. ', 'Aggregate huge amounts of data and information from large numbers of sources to discover patterns and features necessary to build machine learning models for prediction and forecasting.', 'Develop and maintain the necessary infrastructure to run and maintain the algorithms.Develop a feedback system to improve the selection of features for the algorithms.', 'Experience with both machine learning and building scalable production services.', 'About Activision And Our Family Of Brands', '10 years of experience as machine learning engineer / data scientist.', 'Design and implement end- to- end solutions using Machine Learning, Optimization, and other advanced computer science technologies, and own live deployments to drive advertising conversion.', 'Improve the run- time of existing algorithms.', " Experience in stream processing—Storm, Spark, Flink etc.— and graph processing technologies. Experience working with AWS or Google Cloud Platform (GCP). Experience of working with advertising platform.About Activision And Our Family Of BrandsActivision Blizzard, Inc. (NASDAQ: ATVI), is one of the world's largest and most successful interactive entertainment companies and is at the intersection of media, technology and entertainment. Our combined entertainment network delights hundreds of millions of monthly active users in 196 countries, making us the largest gaming network on the planet!Activision develops, distributes, and publishes deeply immersive interactive entertainment for gaming consoles, mobile and tablet platforms, and PCs, including blockbuster franchises like Call of Duty® and Skylanders®.Blizzard Entertainment develops, distributes and publishes some of the most iconic entertainment experiences in gaming, such as World of Warcraft®, StarCraft®, Diablo®, Hearthstone®, and Heroes of the Storm™, for PCs, mobile and tablet platforms, and consoles.King Digital Entertainment creates leading interactive entertainment for the mobile world. With more than 200 fun titles, King's franchises include Candy Crush ®, Farm Heroes®, Pet Rescue®, and Bubble Witch®.Ready to Play? Apply now!Come join our world and work alongside some of the best and brightest minds in the business.All applications should be made in English."]

['', 'Design and conduct molecular and biochemical assays and screening systems for discovery of genes and enzymes to enhance carbon condensation, assimilation, and retainment in transgenic trees', 'Experience working with qRT-PCR assay is desired', 'We’re looking for someone who’s excited to be part of a mission-driven early stage company. As our Research Scientist, you will play an essential role in planning and executing molecular biology experiments to help meet the company goals. A successful candidate will have experience with molecular biology, cloning, and molecular assay technologies, and a strong working knowledge of plants. You will also have the opportunity to contribute to the company’s strategic goals and think creatively about how to move quickly and solve problems.\xa0', 'Keep a detailed record of experimental data and analysis. Summarize project progress in written reports and present during team meetings. Timely communication of project progress to the leadership team. Participate in scheduling and forecasting meetings, be flexible, be able to handle multiple projects and help drive key decisions with solid data and scientific leadership.', 'Author assay protocols, SOPs, work instructions and other documents as needed', 'Your Previous Experience:', 'Expertise working with complex protocols, making reagents is desired', 'Develop and optimize molecular assays in the area of molecular biology and biochemistry including but not limited to PCR, qRT-PCR, Western blot, Mass Spec', 'Experience with protein engineering is a plus', 'We believe the best solutions to climate change are created by diverse teams. Living Carbon is focused on building a multicultural and inclusive team with strong representation from the many diverse communities disproportionately impacted by climate change. As a public benefit corporation, ensuring solutions to slow climate change are widely distributed to all peoples is critical to the success of our mission.\xa0\xa0', 'If you believe that climate change is the defining global emergency of the century and want to join an ambitious project that’s working on a biological solution, we’d love to hear from you.', 'Experience with bioinformatic tools for DNA and protein sequence analysis is highly desirable', 'Your role:', 'Lead the hands-on execution of molecular characterization of transgenic materialsPerform extraction, purification, and quantitation of DNA, RNA, and protein from transgenic plant tissue samplesDevelop and optimize molecular assays in the area of molecular biology and biochemistry including but not limited to PCR, qRT-PCR, Western blot, Mass SpecDesign and make plant expression vectors to optimize transgene gene expression for the ultimate goal of improving trait performancesDesign and conduct molecular and biochemical assays and screening systems for discovery of genes and enzymes to enhance carbon condensation, assimilation, and retainment in transgenic treesMaintain up-to-date knowledge in molecular biology and biochemistry and proactively propose and implement application of new technologies and ideas to improve the workflow and to speed up the project goalsAuthor assay protocols, SOPs, work instructions and other documents as neededKeep a detailed record of experimental data and analysis. Summarize project progress in written reports and present during team meetings. Timely communication of project progress to the leadership team. Participate in scheduling and forecasting meetings, be flexible, be able to handle multiple projects and help drive key decisions with solid data and scientific leadership.May train and oversee the work of lab technicians, providing ongoing coaching, guidance and feedback to ensure technicians are successful in their work, as well as have the necessary and timely access to information and other resources.', 'May train and oversee the work of lab technicians, providing ongoing coaching, guidance and feedback to ensure technicians are successful in their work, as well as have the necessary and timely access to information and other resources.', 'Demonstrated ability to plan experiments, analyze data sets, interpret results, trouble-shoot experiments, prepare reports, and present results', 'Demonstrated hands-on experience in general molecular biology involving isolation, manipulation, and characterization of DNA and RNA from tissue samples\xa0', 'Perform extraction, purification, and quantitation of DNA, RNA, and protein from transgenic plant tissue samples', 'Experience with protein biochemistry including purification and immunoassay is preferred', 'Hands-on expertise in molecular cloning and sequencing (Sanger and NGS) is desirable', 'Maintain up-to-date knowledge in molecular biology and biochemistry and proactively propose and implement application of new technologies and ideas to improve the workflow and to speed up the project goals', 'Design and make plant expression vectors to optimize transgene gene expression for the ultimate goal of improving trait performances', 'MS/Ph.D in Molecular Biology, Biology, Biochemistry or related field', 'Living Carbon PBC offers competitive compensation, and generous healthcare, dental and vision insurance.\xa0', 'Living Carbon is a pre-launch public benefit corporation with a mission to fight climate change by enhancing CO2 capture and storage in trees. We believe that gigaton scale CO2 drawdown will only happen if solutions are both environmentally beneficial and profitable to landowners. We’re working with some of the largest timber companies in the US and well-known reforestation projects to develop a proof of concept. We’re backed by some of the most prominent investors in Silicon Valley including, YCombinator, Sam Altman, and Chris Sacca of LowerCarbon Capital.\xa0', 'Responsibilities:', 'Lead the hands-on execution of molecular characterization of transgenic materials', 'Living Carbon PBC is an equal opportunity employer.\xa0', 'MS/Ph.D in Molecular Biology, Biology, Biochemistry or related fieldDemonstrated hands-on experience in general molecular biology involving isolation, manipulation, and characterization of DNA and RNA from tissue samples\xa0Experience working with qRT-PCR assay is desiredHands-on expertise in molecular cloning and sequencing (Sanger and NGS) is desirableExperience with bioinformatic tools for DNA and protein sequence analysis is highly desirableExperience with protein biochemistry including purification and immunoassay is preferredExperience with protein engineering is a plusExpertise working with complex protocols, making reagents is desiredDemonstrated ability to plan experiments, analyze data sets, interpret results, trouble-shoot experiments, prepare reports, and present results']

job_title: People Data Science and Analytics Lead
job_text: ['', 'Experience managing and working with large databases, data management, including understanding of various data structures and common methods in data transformation, data validation and audit.', 'Passion for HR innovation and a clear vision for how we can use People Analytics to drive meaningful impact towards business priorities.', 'Working with our Employee Experience Centers of Excellence to design programs with end state analysis in mind', 'High integrity and discretion. People data is some of our most sensitive data and we expect employees with access to this to act with utmost professionalism.', ' Building out and maintaining the People Analytics database. This includes constructing the architecture, and integrating multiple systems and data sources to build large and complex data sets to make them usable for analytics studies. Developing core metrics and dashboards to ensure our business leadership have easy access to the right information when monitoring organizational health and making talent decisions. Initiating and executing on data-guided analyses to help solve, inform, and support our Executive Team and our Employee Experience Centers of Excellence (i.e., Learning and Development; Total Rewards; Belonging, Inclusion, and Diversity, etc.) drive a highly engaged and performant employee base Leveraging our People Data to proactively identify new opportunities to drive high engagement, retention, and performance across the company. Job Requirements)', '6+ years relevant experience covering: statistical techniques, advanced research design, and analytics/decision sciences with expertise in predictive modeling, time series forecasting, natural language processing (content and sentiment analysis), network analysis, machine learning, data mining, etc.']

['Typical Qualifications', 'Summary', 'Principal Data Scientist', ' Advanced degree required in a relevant field such as (PhD, MS) in computer science, data science, math, statistics and other related disciplines.  7+ years of experience including 5+ years of professional experience in some or all aspects of designing, building, training, deploying and evaluating machine learning models in production software environments at scale  Expertise in leveraging advanced techniques in areas such as deep learning, NLP, classification, predictive modeling, etc.  Proficiency with Python and/or other programming languages, e.g., Perl, C/C++, java, etc.  Proficiency with data analysis and modeling tools, e.g., python, Jupyter, R, RStudio, and libraries like tensorflow and pyTorch. ', 'You want to use the newest tech, but you want to do so in a large environment so you can see how that technology is used when scale matters. ', 'Familiarity with Linux/Unix/Shell environments, AWS experience strongly preferred', " We are looking for a Principal Data Scientist who will serve as a senior member for client health's data scientists focused on machine learning, predictive analytics and related projects.  As a Data Science Principal in client intelligence division, you will be a leader within our team of data scientists, developing the most relevant models, and using the best technologies for implementation.  You are a data aficionado with a passion for machine learning and automation.  You want to use the newest tech, but you want to do so in a large environment so you can see how that technology is used when scale matters.  ", "We are looking for a Principal Data Scientist who will serve as a senior member for client health's data scientists focused on machine learning, predictive analytics and related projects. ", 'You are a data aficionado with a passion for machine learning and automation. ', 'Advanced degree required in a relevant field such as (PhD, MS) in computer science, data science, math, statistics and other related disciplines. ', "Our client intelligence team unleashes the power of client health's one-of-a-kind healthcare dataset by applying advanced analytics and machine learning to terabytes of data. ", "As a technical contributor you will work with an exceptional team of data scientists, statisticians and engineers with the drive, instinct, and curiosity to deliver insights from data across client's network. ", 'Proficiency with Python and/or other programming languages, e.g., Perl, C/C++, java, etc. ', 'Proficiency with data analysis and modeling tools, e.g., python, Jupyter, R, RStudio, and libraries like tensorflow and pyTorch. ', 'The Team', " Our client intelligence team unleashes the power of client health's one-of-a-kind healthcare dataset by applying advanced analytics and machine learning to terabytes of data. Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases. Experience building and optimizing ‘big data’ data pipelines, architectures and data sets. In depth knowledge of Model and Design of DB schemas for read and write performance. Extensive working knowledge of API or Stream based data extraction processes like Salesforce API and Bulk API is must. Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement. Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management. A successful history of manipulating, processing and extracting value from large disconnected datasets. Working knowledge of message queuing, stream processing, and highly scalable ‘big data’ data stores. Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment. Experience with building data pipeline from various business applications like Salesforce, Marketo, NetSuite, Workday etc.  Experience with big data tools: Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Spark & Kafka Streaming, Python, Scala, Talend etc. Working knowledge of BI Tools like Tableau, Looker etc is plus ', 'Outcomes', 'Experience performing root cause analysis on internal and external data and processes to answer specific business questions and identify opportunities for improvement.', 'Collaboration:', 'Competencies', 'Build processes supporting data transformation, data structures, metadata, dependency and workload management.', 'Benefits', 'Experience supporting and working with cross-functional teams in a dynamic environment.', 'Extensive working knowledge of API or Stream based data extraction processes like Salesforce API and Bulk API is must.']

job_title: Clinical Research Scientist (South San Francisco, CA)
job_text: ['', 'Preferred Qualifications', '3-5 years experience conducting clinical research with human subjects.', ' An advanced degree (PhD) and background in a quantitative field of biology (systems neuroscience, bioengineering, computational biology, etc.). Ability to synthesize outcomes of clinical research and complex machine learning techniques, and communicate ideas in oral or written form for both technical and non-technical audiences. 3-5 years experience conducting clinical research with human subjects. Exceptional analytical skills - Ability to develop hypotheses, design experiments, and develop analytical plans. Demonstrated of ability to deliver against timelines and execute in rapidly evolving circumstance. Demonstrated writing ability for medical and/or technical journals. ', 'Ability to synthesize outcomes of clinical research and complex machine learning techniques, and communicate ideas in oral or written form for both technical and non-technical audiences.', 'Candidates who have worked in a regulated space (medical device, drug) and supported regulatory submissions preferred.', 'An advanced degree (PhD) and background in a quantitative field of biology (systems neuroscience, bioengineering, computational biology, etc.).', 'Demonstrated of ability to deliver against timelines and execute in rapidly evolving circumstance. Demonstrated writing ability for medical and/or technical journals.', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Description', 'Preference given to candidates with a background in signal processing, data science, or machine learning.', 'Lead the clinical study design process, both with internal and external partners. Define the type of evidence needed to achieve project goals, design a series of clinical studies / experiments, and work with the team to draft clinical study protocols and other study materials for IRB submission.', 'Qualifications', ' Serve as a subject matter expert for internal teams and partners. Advise potential partners on existing and potential technical capabilities, and evaluate strategic fit with company goals. Lead the clinical study design process, both with internal and external partners. Define the type of evidence needed to achieve project goals, design a series of clinical studies / experiments, and work with the team to draft clinical study protocols and other study materials for IRB submission. Collaborate closely with Data Science to perform literature reviews, and define the approach to develop digital biomarkers. Develop the analytical and clinical validation plans for digital biomarkers under consideration. Author clinical study reports and other clinical documents. Prepare abstracts, poster presentations, slides, and manuscripts for publication in peer-reviewed medical and technical journals. ', 'Serve as a subject matter expert for internal teams and partners. Advise potential partners on existing and potential technical capabilities, and evaluate strategic fit with company goals.', 'Exceptional analytical skills - Ability to develop hypotheses, design experiments, and develop analytical plans.', ' Preference given to candidates with a background in signal processing, data science, or machine learning. Candidates who have worked in a regulated space (medical device, drug) and supported regulatory submissions preferred.', 'Responsibilities', 'Author clinical study reports and other clinical documents. Prepare abstracts, poster presentations, slides, and manuscripts for publication in peer-reviewed medical and technical journals.', 'Collaborate closely with Data Science to perform literature reviews, and define the approach to develop digital biomarkers. Develop the analytical and clinical validation plans for digital biomarkers under consideration.']

job_title: Lead Data Engineer- Data Platform (Open to Remote Workers)
job_text: ['', 'Medidata: Conquering Diseases Together ', ' Leveraging semantic data modeling frameworks like RDF, OWL, and SHACL ', ' Identify meaningful insights from large data and metadata sources; interpret and communicate insights and findings from analysis and experiments to product, service, and business managers ', ' Applying machine learning algorithms to large data sets ', ' Provide technology leadership to a diverse engineering team ', ' Design and program event-driven streaming, batch or micro batch data pipelines to integrate and analyze diverse sources of clinical trial data to generate actionable insights and product enhancements ', ' Design, implement, and document data architecture and data modeling solutions, which include the use of relational, dimensional, NoSQL and NewSQL databases and which support enterprise information management, business intelligence, machine learning, data science, and other business interests ', 'Your Mission', ' Excellent technical documentation and writing skills ', ' Providing technology leadership to a team of engineers ', ' Provide technology leadership to a diverse engineering team  Design and program event-driven streaming, batch or micro batch data pipelines to integrate and analyze diverse sources of clinical trial data to generate actionable insights and product enhancements  Design, implement, and document data architecture and data modeling solutions, which include the use of relational, dimensional, NoSQL and NewSQL databases and which support enterprise information management, business intelligence, machine learning, data science, and other business interests  Identify meaningful insights from large data and metadata sources; interpret and communicate insights and findings from analysis and experiments to product, service, and business managers ', 'Your Competencies', ' Bachelors in math, data or related field ', ' Cloud-oriented with strong understanding of SaaS models and cloud services (preferably AWS) ', ' Coding in multiple languages like Python, Java, Scala, SQL, SPARQL in the context of data-oriented problems ', ' Using a panoply of database technologies, relational and non-relational, including Cassandra, DynamoDB, Athena, Elasticsearch, Redis, various triplestores, and the like ', ' Designing enterprise data models and data-oriented APIs ', ' Providing technology leadership to a team of engineers  Designing enterprise data models and data-oriented APIs  Leveraging semantic data modeling frameworks like RDF, OWL, and SHACL  Building ETL or analytical pipelines combining multiple streaming data technologies including Kafka, Flink, Spark, S3, ElasticSearch, Hadoop, Serverless or similar  Using a panoply of database technologies, relational and non-relational, including Cassandra, DynamoDB, Athena, Elasticsearch, Redis, various triplestores, and the like  Coding in multiple languages like Python, Java, Scala, SQL, SPARQL in the context of data-oriented problems  Cloud-oriented with strong understanding of SaaS models and cloud services (preferably AWS)  Excellent technical documentation and writing skills  You have a bias towards automation, an Agile/Lean mindset and embrace the Devops culture  Applying machine learning algorithms to large data sets ', ' Bachelors in math, data or related field  Minimum 5 years of experience working in data engineering and or data science ', ' Medidata Solutions, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer. Medidata Solutions provides equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, age, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by the law. Medidata Solutions complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities.', ' Minimum 5 years of experience working in data engineering and or data science ', ' You have a bias towards automation, an Agile/Lean mindset and embrace the Devops culture ', 'Your Education & Experience', ' Building ETL or analytical pipelines combining multiple streaming data technologies including Kafka, Flink, Spark, S3, ElasticSearch, Hadoop, Serverless or similar ']

['', 'Excellent in planning and executing user research studies, whether more traditional user testing or more experimental concept testing', 'Collaborate with Product Design, Engineering, and PM teams (among others) in gathering requirements for research projects and creating plans to execute against them', 'Expand how we can help other departments utilize qualitative and quantitative research findings for their own initiatives', 'Do more research further upstream in the product development cycleDo more concepting and concept tastingRemove dependencies on UX and Eng to do mockups or prototypes for research efforts\xa0Increase volume and speed of the research and user testing we doExpand how we can help other departments utilize qualitative and quantitative research findings for their own initiatives', 'Prototype new product concepts, workflows, and feature sets\xa0', 'If a project has ambiguity you work to resolve that in order to move the project forward. (I mentioned scrappiness, right?)\xa0', 'Help train other departments on research methodologies so they can perform simple research themselves', 'Below is a list of related tasks we expect the candidate to perform and the skills required to do so. Keep in mind our desire for a prototyper stems from the desire to move research further upstream in the product development lifecycle, so our team can more readily identify what to build and how to build it (rather than just test what was already built). This role will help us identify how users approach their tasks, what workflows might work for them, and how the product features work together to serve their needs.', 'Ability to collaborate across departments', 'Excellent at communicating research findings, and willing to explore different ways to do that beyond a typical research report (e.g. infographic, video, illustrations, prototype)', '5+ years prototyping experience with highly interactive business tools or B2C apps/sites\xa0', 'Do more concepting and concept tasting', 'Remove dependencies on UX and Eng to do mockups or prototypes for research efforts\xa0', 'Ability to prototype complex workflows and interactions in a way that gets the insights we need from users. The tools you use to prototype are less important than they being sufficient to get the information we want. E.g. if you prototype in code, it won’t be expected to be used by Engineering. If you prototype with InVision, React, proto.io, or others, it matters more that you can execute what is needed in a reasonable amount of time than what format you do it in.\xa0', 'Do more research further upstream in the product development cycle', 'You will:', 'Collaborate on how Research communicates its findings to the rest of the company', 'Excellent communication skills', 'Work with the Head of Research & Insights to define research priorities and what level of prototyping is necessary for projects at hand\xa0Collaborate with Product Design, Engineering, and PM teams (among others) in gathering requirements for research projects and creating plans to execute against themPrototype new product concepts, workflows, and feature sets\xa0Help train other departments on research methodologies so they can perform simple research themselvesCollaborate on how Research communicates its findings to the rest of the companyDo things that run counter to pure research methodology because we have to be creative and scrappy sometimes. Creativity, flexibility, and a desire to really understand and help users use Sigma are highly valued.\xa0', '5+ years doing user research, ideally leading research projects or being the primary researcher', 'Desired Experience and Skills', 'Do things that run counter to pure research methodology because we have to be creative and scrappy sometimes. Creativity, flexibility, and a desire to really understand and help users use Sigma are highly valued.\xa0', 'Let’s be honest about that last part. Few business tools of any power have been truly easy for non-technical users to pick up immediately. And that’s certainly true in BI. But we’re going to change that. Our Research & Insights team has already uncovered keys for doing just that and we’re looking for a UX Prototyper Researcher to help us get there.\xa0', 'Work with the Head of Research & Insights to define research priorities and what level of prototyping is necessary for projects at hand\xa0', 'This role will help Sigma:', 'Sigma’s vision is to create an insight-driven world where people and organizations are transformed for the better by access to data and the insights they discover within it. At Sigma, we are building a cloud-native business intelligence platform that anyone can use -- no programming required.\xa0', '5+ years prototyping experience with highly interactive business tools or B2C apps/sites\xa0Ability to prototype complex workflows and interactions in a way that gets the insights we need from users. The tools you use to prototype are less important than they being sufficient to get the information we want. E.g. if you prototype in code, it won’t be expected to be used by Engineering. If you prototype with InVision, React, proto.io, or others, it matters more that you can execute what is needed in a reasonable amount of time than what format you do it in.\xa0The flexibility to prototype in different ways for different projects is desired5+ years doing user research, ideally leading research projects or being the primary researcherExcellent in planning and executing user research studies, whether more traditional user testing or more experimental concept testingExcellent at communicating research findings, and willing to explore different ways to do that beyond a typical research report (e.g. infographic, video, illustrations, prototype)Excellent communication skillsAbility to collaborate across departmentsIf a project has ambiguity you work to resolve that in order to move the project forward. (I mentioned scrappiness, right?)\xa0', 'The flexibility to prototype in different ways for different projects is desired', 'Increase volume and speed of the research and user testing we do']

company: The Johns Hopkins University Applied Physics Laboratory
job_text: ['', '5 years of prior research experience.', 'You’ll go above and beyond our minimum requirements if you have:', 'Experience writing published papers and presenting results to conferences/workshops.', "If so, we're looking for someone like you to join our APL team.", ' Perform basic and/or applied research to address urgent gaps in defensive cybersecurity, including network security, host-based security, mobile security, cloud security, IoT security, software development, and integrated automated cybersecurity. Provide thought leadership and technical leadership in a research environment. Participate in research projects to develop new approaches to cyber defense. Transform concepts into functioning prototypes to demonstrate the feasibility and effectiveness of new and emerging solutions. Participate in teams working to advance defensive capabilities of essential national systems. Analyze and assess existing capabilities and identify exposed gaps. Work with staff to devise and develop algorithms, methods, and new solutions for improving defensive capabilities.  Actively engage the broader community by publishing papers and presenting research outcomes in academic settings. Share knowledge by clearly articulating ideas through papers and presentations to technical staff, management and Government decision makers. Take advantage of opportunities to participate in community working groups, sponsor meetings, proposal writing, and conferences. ', ' PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or related field. 5 years of prior research experience. Experience in a variety of programming languages, and be able to develop software to demonstrate new security concepts. Experience with one or more of the following: Windows, Unix-like operating systems (e.g., Linux), shell scripting; malware analysis and reverse engineering; networking protocols (e.g., TCP, HTTP, and SMTP); cloud computing; virtualization (e.g., KVM, Xen, VMware), and IoT. Excellent written and oral communication skills. Ability to obtain a Secret clearance. If selected, you will be subject to a government security clearance investigation and must meet the requirements for access to classified information. Eligibility requirements include U.S. citizenship. ', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills.', 'Provide thought leadership and technical leadership in a research environment.', 'A current DoD clearance and prior experience working with Government agencies are desirable.', 'Perform basic and/or applied research to address urgent gaps in defensive cybersecurity, including network security, host-based security, mobile security, cloud security, IoT security, software development, and integrated automated cybersecurity.', ' PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or related field.  7 years of cyber related research experience.  Demonstrated leadership in directing and conducting research efforts, including prior experience as Principal Investigator. Strong background in computer/network security concepts and technologies, including extensive knowledge of enterprise security operations and computer network vulnerabilities and exploits. Experience writing published papers and presenting results to conferences/workshops. A current DoD clearance and prior experience working with Government agencies are desirable. Active TS/SCI clearance. ', 'Participate in teams working to advance defensive capabilities of essential national systems. Analyze and assess existing capabilities and identify exposed gaps. Work with staff to devise and develop algorithms, methods, and new solutions for improving defensive capabilities.', ' Demonstrated leadership in directing and conducting research efforts, including prior experience as Principal Investigator.', 'PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or related field. ', 'You meet the minimum qualifications for this position if you have:', 'Ability to obtain a Secret clearance. If selected, you will be subject to a government security clearance investigation and must meet the requirements for access to classified information. Eligibility requirements include U.S. citizenship.', 'Active TS/SCI clearance.', 'Experience with one or more of the following: Windows, Unix-like operating systems (e.g., Linux), shell scripting; malware analysis and reverse engineering; networking protocols (e.g., TCP, HTTP, and SMTP); cloud computing; virtualization (e.g., KVM, Xen, VMware), and IoT.', '7 years of cyber related research experience.', 'PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, Electrical Engineering, or related field.', 'Experience in a variety of programming languages, and be able to develop software to demonstrate new security concepts.', 'Strong background in computer/network security concepts and technologies, including extensive knowledge of enterprise security operations and computer network vulnerabilities and exploits.', 'Why work at APL?', ' Actively engage the broader community by publishing papers and presenting research outcomes in academic settings. Share knowledge by clearly articulating ideas through papers and presentations to technical staff, management and Government decision makers. Take advantage of opportunities to participate in community working groups, sponsor meetings, proposal writing, and conferences.', 'Participate in research projects to develop new approaches to cyber defense. Transform concepts into functioning prototypes to demonstrate the feasibility and effectiveness of new and emerging solutions.']

', 'Toyota Connected is expanding our Labs Team. In Labs, you will work with other talented engineers to use Machine Learning, NLP, and other cutting-edge technology to transform the customer experience with their vehicle. From making it possible to start your car and check fuel range in the comforts of your home to enhancing the communication with our vehicles and how our vehicles communicate with each other and the world around us, Labs makes driving a Toyota or Lexus a high-class experience. ', 'Toyota Connected is a new company created to infuse the power of big data and cloud intelligence into all aspects of the mobility experience so that driving a Toyota or Lexus is more personal, intuitive and safe. We create and enable technologies that delight, simplify and connect the lives of those who use our products. We believe this mobility revolution will empower our customers to use their vehicles in an array of exciting new ways. We support, celebrate and thrive on the opportunity to provide Mobility for All. ', 'Experience in one or more NLP libraries (i.e. spaCy, NLTK, etc) is a plus ', 'Job Description: 6 Month+ Contract', ' ', 'Experience implementing solutions in a cloud environment (AWS or Azure) is a plus ', 'Qualifications: ', 'Develop tools and libraries that will enable rapid and scalable development in the future ', 'Responsibilities: ', 'Free catered lunches every day. We try to keep it healthy, but Fridays are “cheat” days, so you can get your carbs on! ', 'Design and develop solutions using Machine Learning and other advanced AI technologies to solve a variety of problems ']

experience.', 'Experience in one or more phases of the product lifecycle, from early generative research, to concept evaluation, to ship, to in-market UX research ', 'Experience working with design teams ', 'Able to work closely with other UX researchers to help design research plans and specific studies, as well as communicate findings with stakeholders and drive impact of the work.', ["Our Customer is one of the leading global interconnection platforms and the world’s largest data center provider. They connect the world's leading businesses to their customers, employees and partners inside the world's most connected data centers in 52 markets across five continents. Their mission is to protect, connect and power the digital economy. ", 'Company Industry:\xa0Technology ', 'What You’ll Do:● Develop and maintain scalable ETL pipelines, build new pipelines and facilitate API integrations to support new requirements● Writing complex SQL queries to serve new requirements for ETL, data analysis and debugging● Writing SQL functions, procedures as required based on the requirements● Fine-tune or optimize queries to support the increasing volume of data● Debug Python code, modify and enhance Python ETL applications based on the requirements on Linux environment● Writing reusable and efficient code in Java, Python and SQL● Develop Rest APIs using java libraries● Write unit, functional, regression tests for enhanced feature, maintain engineering documentation● Communicate closely with all product owners, Business and engineering teams to develop approaches for data platform architecture ', 'We are seeking a Senior SQL Data Engineer on a contract basis with advanced knowledge of SQL and intermediate knowledge of Python. ', 'In this role your primary focus will be writing complex SQL queries, optimizing them and development of all server-side backend data processing logic, ensuring high performance using Python and SQL. ', 'Opportunity:', 'Hours & Location:M-F, 40 hours/week. This role will be remote while Covid restrictions are in place. The expectation is to be onsite at Sunnyvale, CA location once it is deemed safe to do so. ', ' ', 'Now for the Perks!Health Benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision, Life (including spouse & child), 401k, STD/LTD, AD&D, and Commuter Benefits program.', 'Company Industry:', 'The candidate must be able to pass I-9 verification. ', 'Opportunity:\xa0The Mom Project is helping to source candidates for the above client who is looking for a\xa0Senior SQL Data EngineerCommitment Level:\xa0 40 hours per week, on-site, contract through December 2020 ', 'Commitment Level:', 'Must Haves:● 5+ years of experience having hands on experience in writing, debugging and optimizing SQL queries, function and stored procedures.● 3+ years of experience with hands on experience in writing, debugging Python code on Linux.● Basics of Computer Science - OOPS, Data Structures and Algorithms● Basic understanding of regular Linux commands and usage● Experience writing Python applications that interact with ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries● Knowledge of XML and JSON parsing with unit test and debugging skills● Willingness and ability to learn new tools/languages as needed● Process-oriented with excellent verbal and written communication skill with a desire for customer service● Excellent team player and communicator who can work effectively with cross functional teams and ability to navigate ambiguity● Beginner or intermediate level java experience a plus! ', "Education: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field "]

job_title: Data Engineer - Orlando and Surrounding area
job_text: ['', ' Handle multiple priorities simultaneously', 'Data Engineer Role', ' Be Supported: A large network of industry experts, internal training platform, and external learning opportunities to grow your skills and experience.', ' Be Rewarded: A competitive salary and instant vesting on 401k are only a few of the rewards for a job well done.', ' Provide technical requirements to the data engineering team for conversion of business requirements to reporting data layer.', ' 5+ years’ experience in designing and implementing the data structures (conceptual, logical, physical & dimensional models) for reporting tools like MicroStrategy, Tableau or any reporting tools', ' Be a Team: Team outings, happy hours, passion presentations, volunteer opportunities, meetups, etc. we are creating a community to continuously share and grow as a team.', ' Be Inspired - Collaborative workspace, personal days, paid birthday off, and vacation time to keep your mind fresh and ready to take on the next new idea.', 'Experience', ' Perform data analysis, data modeling and data design tasks / transformation on complicated datasets with potentially complex data integration scenarios related to reporting.', ' 8+ years database, data integration experience', ' Heavy, In-Depth Database Knowledge – SQL and NoSQL.', ' Be knowledgeable in visualization tools data requirements for MicroStrategy / Tableau', ' Proven track record working with complex, interrelated systems and bringing that data together on Big Data platforms.', ' 3+ years’ experience with Hadoop, SQL, and Big Data solutions', 'What do you get out of this?', 'Primary Responsibilities', '  Convert business requirements into Reporting Data layer design for Business Intelligence tools.  Provide technical requirements to the data engineering team for conversion of business requirements to reporting data layer.  Develop reporting data layer for business intelligence tools like MicroStrategy and Tableau using big data platform databases / querying (like Impala, Hive, Kudu) as well as modern cloud data warehouse like Snowflake.  Perform data analysis, data modeling and data design tasks / transformation on complicated datasets with potentially complex data integration scenarios related to reporting.  Build data structures / database objects and data blending technologies to support data harmonization and provide data to MicroStrategy / Tableau and self-service reporting templates. ', '  8+ years database, data integration experience  3+ years’ experience with Hadoop, SQL, and Big Data solutions  5+ years’ experience in designing and implementing the data structures (conceptual, logical, physical & dimensional models) for reporting tools like MicroStrategy, Tableau or any reporting tools  Supporting data enablement for enterprise Business Intelligence solutions using one or more of the following EDW platforms: Big Data Platforms / HANA / BW / Snowflake  Development experience in using Big Data solutions using open source technologies within the Hadoop ecosystem such as: Impala, Hive, Spark, Pig, etc.  Strong knowledge of scripting to support data requirements  Strong knowledge of reporting related data security principles  Proven track record working with complex, interrelated systems and bringing that data together on Big Data platforms.  Be knowledgeable in visualization tools data requirements for MicroStrategy / Tableau  Heavy, In-Depth Database Knowledge – SQL and NoSQL. ', ' Development experience in using Big Data solutions using open source technologies within the Hadoop ecosystem such as: Impala, Hive, Spark, Pig, etc.', ' Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams', '  Be Healthy - Health, dental, and vision offered through top tier providers and sick leave to keep you feeling at the top of your game.  Be Inspired - Collaborative workspace, personal days, paid birthday off, and vacation time to keep your mind fresh and ready to take on the next new idea.  Be Rewarded: A competitive salary and instant vesting on 401k are only a few of the rewards for a job well done.  Be Supported: A large network of industry experts, internal training platform, and external learning opportunities to grow your skills and experience.  Be a Team: Team outings, happy hours, passion presentations, volunteer opportunities, meetups, etc. we are creating a community to continuously share and grow as a team.', ' Build data structures / database objects and data blending technologies to support data harmonization and provide data to MicroStrategy / Tableau and self-service reporting templates.', '  Handle multiple priorities simultaneously  Work collaboratively with cross-functional teams  Establish and maintain a working environment conducive to positive morale, individual style, quality, creativity, and teamwork  Ability to work in a fast-paced, team environment ', ' Convert business requirements into Reporting Data layer design for Business Intelligence tools.', ' Establish and maintain a working environment conducive to positive morale, individual style, quality, creativity, and teamwork', ' Supporting data enablement for enterprise Business Intelligence solutions using one or more of the following EDW platforms: Big Data Platforms / HANA / BW / Snowflake', ' Develop reporting data layer for business intelligence tools like MicroStrategy and Tableau using big data platform databases / querying (like Impala, Hive, Kudu) as well as modern cloud data warehouse like Snowflake.', ' Ability to work in a fast-paced, team environment', ' Be Healthy - Health, dental, and vision offered through top tier providers and sick leave to keep you feeling at the top of your game.', 'About Pandera', ' Strong knowledge of scripting to support data requirements', ' Strong knowledge of reporting related data security principles', 'Essential Functions']

job_text: ['', 'Coordinate all tasks within the data science process between different team members from database development to database lock; prepare data science plans, data entry guidelines, data science reports and other documents required for preparing and completing databases; support database development activities and coordinates database amendments in collaboration with the database development team', 'You’ll Need This To Be Considered', 'Bachelor’s degree (post graduate degree preferred), preferably in a Life Science along with 8-12 years mastery in Data Management experience, including 3-7 years of supervisory/management experienceProven experience working across Clinical Data Management Systems and in-depth knowledge of at least one, preferably Medidata Rave and DataLabs EDCFamiliar with all phases of a study, e.g., pre-award, study startup/database setup, maintenance, and lock; working knowledge of data mining and the application of data standards as well as statistical principles and analysisSelf-starter with common sense and ability to act on own initiativeAccountable, dependable and strong commitmentApplies clear and consistent performance standards and handles problems decisively and objectivelyCustomer service focused in approach to work, both internally and externallyMaintains a positive, results orientated work environmentStrong presentation skills and communication skills, both written and verbal', 'Provide leadership as you’ll directly manage a team of Data Scientists and other Clinical Data Sciences staff; interview, onboard, train, and evaluate new employees to facilitate integration into the department and to be successful contributors to our team. job_text: ['', '• Troubleshoot data quality issues - identifying root cause/system & documentation/communication of resolution', '• Ensure the effective collection, organization and distribution of data, from a variety of data sources', '• Strong communication skills with the ability to explain technical data analysis results to business people and business processes, challenges and issues to technical people', '• Good knowledge of database client software (i.e. TOAD, SQL+, SQL Developer)', '• Design logical/physical data structures leveraging modeling experience', '• Identify, design, and implement internal process improvements: automating manual processes, optimizing data delivery, re-designing data infrastructure for greater scalability, etc.', '• Translate business requirements and unstructured business issues into data analytic problems', 'Be a subject matter expert on ARS data and reporting solutions to influence the design of logical and physical data structures for integrity, scalability and performance', '• Drive the adoption of cloud-based data storage or reporting tools', '• Experience in data extraction, data manipulation, analysis and reporting required', '#ME – 12107', 'Architect is responsible for understanding data and analytical needs, conceptualizing the cutting-edge analytical approaches, enabling high-volume complex advanced analytics services on an ongoing basis and leading the development of reusable solutions. ', '• Perform an enablement role to facilitate data scientists in locating, understanding and selecting the appropriate ARS data', '• Create best practices for testing/profiling of data to ensure proper operation and accuracy', '• Bachelor’s or Masters in a field such as Math, Computer Science or Data Architecture', 'Location: \xa0NORTHBROOK, IL', '• Advanced data management, quality assurance and data flow skills', '• Deliver value-add solutions at the speed of business', '• Experience building BI platforms in hybrid cloud and on-premise environment', 'Job Description:', 'Duration:', '• Business acumen and strong stakeholder management skills', '• Assist with data-related technical issues and support data infrastructure needs', '• Create and maintain excellent data documentation that allows the data to be understood (Metadata) and leveraged for additional use.', '• Microsoft Office experience required', '• Deep expertise in relational databases and data warehousing required', '• Experience in dashboard design and development preferred', '• Experience working with Big Data distributed computing such as Hadoop/MapReduce preferred\xa0\xa0', '\xa0', 'Duration: \xa06 Months+', 'This role ensures there are robust data strategies in place that align to business goals, reporting and analytical capabilities that meet the full breadth of company needs. ', 'The Data & Business Intelligence Architect is responsible for the reporting and data architecture of ARS. ', 'Key Responsibilities:', '• Lead/influence the selection of next generation of data storage/management/reporting tools', 'Big Data Engineer', '• Partner with ETL team to ensure efficient and accurate data loads', '• 5-7 years of direct experience in business intelligence, reporting and data design, development, support and operations with a leading tool suite', 'Skillsets and Experience:', '• Technical expertise in Oracle PL/SQL and MSSQL (T-SQL) queries', '• Experience with BI tool such as Power BI, Business Objects/Cognos and Tableau.', 'Location:', '• Design presentation/consumption layer to enable BI reporting']

job_title: Senior Data Engineer (Python, Spark, Airflow, AWS)
job_text: ['', 'Create automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate the data services and data pipelines.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, related degrees or relevant technical experience.5-7+ years implementing data engineering and distributed systems.\xa0Building and deploying large-scale, complex data services and data pipelines.Python developmentPipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or LuigiData processing platforms such as Spark, Hadoop, etc.Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.', 'BS/MS in Computer Science, related degrees or relevant technical experience.', 'Pipeline scheduling and monitoring systems, like Airflow or Luigi', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health', 'You are an experienced technologist who has a proven track record of designing and building large scale solutions using big data technologies, ideally using Spark, Airflow and Python.\xa0', 'Design, develop, and implement distributed data systems using Spark or similar technologies to ingest incoming data at scale.\xa0Create automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate the data services and data pipelines.Evaluate new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.Collaborate with data scientists to implement validation and/or data quality enhancements.', 'Help architect and implement new data ingestion framework', 'We are looking for an experienced Data Engineer on the Healthcare Map / Data Platform team to play a key role in enabling Komodo scalability. In this role, you will have the opportunity to help solve complex challenges and be a part of a great team. Our engineering team is currently about 90 and growing rapidly. You will be able to use one of the biggest, most complete healthcare datasets to solve real world problems that deliver value to clients and positive impact on the world.\xa0Some of the tools we use are: Python, Snowflake, Airflow, AWS EMR, AWS Lambda, Spark, AWS EKS, and Docker.', 'As one of the members of this business-critical team, you will:', 'Write code to ingest new data sources at high scale', 'Help operate existing data sources', 'Evaluate new technologies for continuous improvements in Data Engineering.', 'Python development', 'Nice to have:', 'Help architect and implement new data ingestion frameworkWrite code to ingest new data sources at high scaleHelp operate existing data sources', 'At Komodo Health, our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease. Smarter use of data is essential to this mission. We combine the world’s most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map, the industry’s most precise view of the U.S. healthcare system. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'Sincere interest in working at a healthcare startup and passion for healthcare data.', 'After three months, you will:\xa0', 'Building and deploying large-scale, complex data services and data pipelines.', 'Basic knowledge (college level or hands on) of machine learning and statistics.', 'Ability to work as part of a collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.', 'Data processing platforms such as Spark, Hadoop, etc.', 'Design, develop, and implement distributed data systems using Spark or similar technologies to ingest incoming data at scale.\xa0', '5-7+ years implementing data engineering and distributed systems.\xa0', 'What you bring to Komodo Health:\xa0', 'We Breathe Life Into Data', 'Collaborate with data scientists to implement validation and/or data quality enhancements.']
