['', 'For a full list of our current openings, please visit our website < http://www.amyris.com >.', 'Execute existing separations and purification processes, including filtration, extraction, distillation, chromatography crystallization, chromatography and reactive separations, at bench scale.', 'California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018 (“CCPA”)', 'BS in chemical engineering, chemistry, food science or equivalent', 'Present work in written updates and in slides, to be shared with the rest of the Process Development team ', 'Ability to work well in a fast-paced environment, and balance multiple projects', 'Work with scientists and engineers in the evaluation and implementation of new laboratory equipment, including separations units, analytical equipment, and automation tools ', 'Be responsible for individual and co-worker safety ', 'Attention to detail, a can-do attitude, and sensitivity to timelines', 'Present experimental plans for Scientist review, prior to execution.', 'The Downstream Process Development team is seeking an energetic, self-motivated individual to contribute to the bench-scale development of various separations processes, designed to recover biomass and products from fermentation broth. This position requires previous experience with laboratory and/or pilot plant equipment, preferably in an industrial biotech setting. The successful candidate will be responsible for running existing processes, modifying equipment and processes under supervision, analyzing product using a variety of analytical methods, and working with scientists and engineers to develop novel separations techniques. We are looking for a strong team player with a growth mindset, who prioritizes safety, and values the opportunity to work on multiple product lines in a fast-paced environment.', 'Skills', 'BS in chemical engineering, chemistry, food science or equivalent3 months of prior process development experience is required. Prior experience with experimental planning and basic statistical analysis of data is expected. Internship or co-op experience is acceptable, if these skills were clearly demonstrated during that time. Experience with any of the following is strongly preferred: centrifugation, filtration, cell disruption, extraction, chromatography, crystallization and distillationSome fermentation experience is a plus Excellent interpersonal and communications skills Attention to detail, a can-do attitude, and sensitivity to timelinesAbility to work well in a fast-paced environment, and balance multiple projectsAmyris, a leader in industrial synthetic biology, uses its innovative bioscience solutions to achieve renewable products by converting plant sugars into hydrocarbon molecules. Amyris’ molecules are used in wide range of specialty & performance chemicals, flavors & fragrances and in applications ranging from cosmetics to biofuels. Learn more at www.amyris.com .As a VEVRAA Federal Contractor, Amyris is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Amyris complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment.For a full list of our current openings, please visit our website < http://www.amyris.com >.', 'Experience with any of the following is strongly preferred: centrifugation, filtration, cell disruption, extraction, chromatography, crystallization and distillation', 'Excellent interpersonal and communications skills ', 'visit our website < http://www.amyris.com >', 'Execute existing separations and purification processes, including filtration, extraction, distillation, chromatography crystallization, chromatography and reactive separations, at bench scale.Document observable data and proceduresPrepare samples for chromatographic analyses, run GC and LC samples, and process the analytical dataPerform non-chromatographic analyses on product and in-process streams, including optimal measurements, LOD, TSS, viscosity and microscopy Work with scientists and engineers in the evaluation and implementation of new laboratory equipment, including separations units, analytical equipment, and automation tools Present experimental plans for Scientist review, prior to execution.Analyze and visualize raw data in Excel, Spotfire and JMPPresent work in written updates and in slides, to be shared with the rest of the Process Development team Be responsible for individual and co-worker safety Embrace Amyris’ Core Values', 'Some fermentation experience is a plus ', 'Embrace Amyris’ Core Values', 'Perform non-chromatographic analyses on product and in-process streams, including optimal measurements, LOD, TSS, viscosity and microscopy ', 'As a VEVRAA Federal Contractor, Amyris is an equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law. Amyris complies with applicable state and local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment.', 'Document observable data and procedures', 'Prepare samples for chromatographic analyses, run GC and LC samples, and process the analytical data', 'Responsibilities', '3 months of prior process development experience is required. Prior experience with experimental planning and basic statistical analysis of data is expected. Internship or co-op experience is acceptable, if these skills were clearly demonstrated during that time. ['', 'Collect open source information for aggregation into our intelligence repository\xa0', 'Design and review security-related functionality such that we can maintain crypto-boundaries\xa0and compliance\xa0with FIPS 140-2\xa0', 'Bachelor degree in computer science, engineering or a related discipline,\xa0A minimum of 3 to 5 years of experience working with web security, or an equivalent combination of education and work experience;\xa0Deep knowledge of web application attack and mitigation techniques (XSS, CSRF, SQL Injection, and Session Management)\xa0Deep knowledge of AWS and Azure environments, security best practices, attack and mitigation techniques\xa0Knowledge of web security protocols\xa0Knowledge of mobile applications attack and mitigation techniques\xa0Experience auditing C/C++ source for vulnerabilities\xa0Experience auditing assembly for vulnerabilities\xa0Experience with a scripting language such as Python\xa0', 'Develop tools to automate security testing and enable more efficient discovery and resolution of security problems\xa0', 'Company-paid short-term disability, long-term disability and Life Insurance coverage. (New hires are eligible for the above benefits on the 1st of the month following their hire date).', 'Familiarity with programming skills in Python or a similar language. Familiarity with development tools such as Git and Jira.\xa0', 'JOB RESPONSIBLTIES:', 'Medical, dental, vision, and voluntary life insurance.', '3 weeks of Paid Time Off.', 'Find and fix security and privacy flaws in\xa0our\xa0software\xa0', 'Employment Type: Full-time', 'Understanding of malware construction, usage, and detection techniques.\xa0', 'Expert-level understanding of post-exploit behaviors, forensic artifacts, and security controls\xa0Familiarity with programming skills in Python or a similar language. Familiarity with development tools such as Git and Jira.\xa0A deep understanding of computer systems, networks, and protocols\xa0Experience in analytic development for OS-agnostic malicious behavior detection including basic techniques such as outlier detection. Knowledge or experience of machine learning applied to the information security domain is a major plus.\xa0Solid programming skills in C, C++, Go, Python,\xa0Security code review, analysis and vulnerability assessment skills\xa0Code obfuscation techniques\xa0Understanding of malware construction, usage, and detection techniques.\xa0', 'A minimum of 3 to 5 years of experience working with web security, or an equivalent combination of education and work experience;\xa0', 'A deep understanding of computer systems, networks, and protocols\xa0', 'Knowledge of mobile applications attack and mitigation techniques\xa0', 'Education: BA degree (Mandatory)', 'REQUIRED EXPERIENCE:', 'Bachelor degree in computer science, engineering or a related discipline,\xa0', 'This division consists of a team of technical leaders that deliver advanced technical solutions to government organizations.\xa0\xa0This position will be responsible for researching and cataloging code vulnerabilities and injection exploits.\xa0\xa0You will use these examples to build signatures and train machine learning models for detection and alerting.\xa0This position will be for someone with\xa0security skills who is an expert in how to find, fix, and prevent vulnerabilities in our software.\xa0', 'SUMMARY:', 'Conduct code reviews of products built in\xa0C/C++, Go, Python\xa0', 'Guide teams on adoption and execution of a Secure Product Life Cycle\xa0', 'Acronis SCS is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. We will not discriminate against any applicant or employee on the basis of age, race, color, creed, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender, gender identity or expression, medical condition, national origin, ancestry, citizenship, marital status or civil partnership/union status, physical or mental disability, pregnancy, childbirth, genetic information, military and veteran status, or any other basis prohibited by applicable federal, state or local law', 'Knowledge of web security protocols\xa0', 'Stock options after (1) year of continuous employment.', 'Seniority Level: Junior Level', 'Develop analysis techniques and mechanisms using various methods, including reputation, static, dynamic, and anomaly based, machine learning\xa0', 'POSITION OVERVIEW:', 'Acronis SCS is an American cyber protection and edge data security company exclusively dedicated to meeting the unique requirements of the US public sector. Our innovative and comprehensive cyber protection, backup and disaster recovery, anti-ransomware, and enterprise file sync and share software solutions ensure operational assurance and data security across America’s federal, state and local government, education, healthcare, and nonprofit computing environments.', 'REQUIRED SKILLS: ', 'Maintain awareness of up-to-date threat and vulnerability profiles\xa0', 'Solid programming skills in C, C++, Go, Python,\xa0', 'Experience in analytic development for OS-agnostic malicious behavior detection including basic techniques such as outlier detection. Knowledge or experience of machine learning applied to the information security domain is a major plus.\xa0', 'Deep knowledge of web application attack and mitigation techniques (XSS, CSRF, SQL Injection, and Session Management)\xa0', 'Experience with a scripting language such as Python\xa0', 'Experience auditing assembly for vulnerabilities\xa0', 'Research into vulnerabilities, exploits, and malware techniques, especially related to code injection and remote exploits\xa0', 'Conduct code reviews of products built in\xa0C/C++, Go, Python\xa0Find and fix security and privacy flaws in\xa0our\xa0software\xa0Design and review security-related functionality such that we can maintain crypto-boundaries\xa0and compliance\xa0with FIPS 140-2\xa0Develop tools to automate security testing and enable more efficient discovery and resolution of security problems\xa0Guide teams on adoption and execution of a Secure Product Life Cycle\xa0Maintain awareness of up-to-date threat and vulnerability profiles\xa0Research into vulnerabilities, exploits, and malware techniques, especially related to code injection and remote exploits\xa0Develop analysis techniques and mechanisms using various methods, including reputation, static, dynamic, and anomaly based, machine learning\xa0Collect open source information for aggregation into our intelligence repository\xa0', 'MANDATORY REQUIREMENTS:', 'Expert-level understanding of post-exploit behaviors, forensic artifacts, and security controls\xa0', 'Security code review, analysis and vulnerability assessment skills\xa0', 'Competitive wage based on experience.', 'Deep knowledge of AWS and Azure environments, security best practices, attack and mitigation techniques\xa0', 'Code obfuscation techniques\xa0', 'Experience auditing C/C++ source for vulnerabilities\xa0', '· Must be a US Citizen', 'COMPENSATION AND BENEFITS:']

['', 'A strong understanding of the theory behind their research and experience.', 'Analyze and present data within the organization.', 'Leading a team in designing and executing multiple experiments for preclinical ophthalmology drug discovery and development programs.', 'A passionate, can-do attitude is a must.', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills.', 'Candidates Will Be Responsible For', '4+ years of doctorate or post-doctoral studies must be in the context of ophthalmology or vision.', 'Preferred Candidates Will Have', 'Strong expertise in mRNA and DNA isolation (cells/tissue) and quantification techniques', 'Carrying out appropriate dissections and sectioning of subjects.', 'PhD in a relevant science.', 'Working closely with other Senior Scientists on the design and execution of experiments.', 'Support efforts to determine delivery and editing in "off target" cells or tissues.', 'Cross training into different areas of R&D analysis regarding molecular biology.', 'Develop and optimize assays to demonstrate gene editing and knock down of target expression', ' PhD in a relevant science. 4+ years of doctorate or post-doctoral studies must be in the context of ophthalmology or vision. Strong expertise in mRNA and DNA isolation (cells/tissue) and quantification techniques A strong understanding of the theory behind their research and experience. Excellent written and oral communication skills. A passionate, can-do attitude is a must.', 'Develop, validate and implement assays as required to accomplish research goals.', ' Leading a team in designing and executing multiple experiments for preclinical ophthalmology drug discovery and development programs. Develop and optimize assays to demonstrate gene editing and knock down of target expression Support efforts to determine delivery and editing in "off target" cells or tissues. Develop, validate and implement assays as required to accomplish research goals. Working closely with other Senior Scientists on the design and execution of experiments. Analyze and present data within the organization. Carrying out appropriate dissections and sectioning of subjects. Cross training into different areas of R&D analysis regarding molecular biology. ']

['', 'In this role, you will use your fraud detection and pattern recognition skills to help lenders and banks detect and prevent fraud on their portfolios.  This is not a data science position but rather a position that involves manually reviewing applications for fraud and misrepresentation risk.\xa0\xa0You will use your experience in underwriting auto loans to help uncover fraud and misrepresentation and then work with our lenders to prevent the fraud from funding.', 'You will interface with clients, prospects and data scientist and fraud consultants at PointPredictive', 'Report directly to the Chief Fraud Strategist at PointPredictive.\xa0\xa0PointPredictive is the fastest growing machine learning company tackling the problems of auto, mortgage, and retail fraud.\xa0']

When you work here, we provide:', 'An understanding of how companies work (their processes and outcomes) or an interest in learning', 'When you join the Canvas team, you’re signing up for the learning experience of your life. ['', 'Qualifications:', 'Current on all recent advances in the field', 'Our teams are crafting solutions to big problems every day. If you’re looking for an opportunity to do impactful work, join TrueAccord and make a difference.', 'Represent TrueAccord in the Machine Learning community', 'Strong passion for research and development with experience in solving hard analytical problems', 'We’re looking for someone who is known for research in machine learning and is capable of transforming it from theory to practical algorithms.', 'Entrepreneurial mindset', 'TrueAccord is a category-defining company. We combine machine learning with a human-based approach to transform debt resolution and to get people on the path towards financial health. Every year, more than 70 million Americans have negative experiences dealing with debt. We are changing this by providing personalized digital experiences that guide lenders and consumers through this challenging financial process.\xa0', 'Why TrueAccord?', 'Work closely with product leadership, other TrueAccord stakeholders, and clients on models, datasets, and insights', 'Your Role:', 'Our Dedication to Diversity & Inclusion', 'PhD in Computer Science with specialization in Machine Learning', 'With a world-class leadership team, passionate team members, and proprietary predictive models trained on years worth of transactional data, TrueAccord is well-positioned to deliver on a huge opportunity: helping millions of consumers to regain and keep their financial footing while lowering the cost of doing business for creditors across many industries.', 'Mentor and guide the Data Science team', 'Continuously improve business impact of our production Machine Learning systems', 'TrueAccord is building a world-class Data Science team to help Americans safeguard their financial health. We are looking for a Chief Scientist to lead it. This is a unique opportunity to use your experience, knowledge, and passion to transform a trillion-dollar industry and bring financial peace of mind to tens of millions of people many of whom had been harassed and abused by commission-driven collections agencies for years. You will join a multi-functional engineering team dedicated to creating a data-driven culture and improving the efficiency of the way we make and implement decisions.', 'Industry presence: published research, blogging, conferences, meetups, open source contributions', 'Deep understanding of cost-effective tradeoffs in large-scale production systems', 'What TrueAccord offers you + Culture & Benefits', '*** Paid training', 'Hunt for quality datasets', 'We offer:', 'Fluent proficiency in Python', '*** Paid holidays', 'Track record of significant business lift from Machine Learning in fintech', 'PhD in Computer Science with specialization in Machine LearningRecent experience in building and managing a strong, impactful data science teamEntrepreneurial mindsetTrack record of significant business lift from Machine Learning in fintechCurrent on all recent advances in the fieldIndustry presence: published research, blogging, conferences, meetups, open source contributionsFluent proficiency in PythonAbility to quickly prototype and test new ideasDeep understanding of cost-effective tradeoffs in large-scale production systemsStrong passion for research and development with experience in solving hard analytical problems', '*** We promote work/life harmony', '\ufeff', '*** Generous paid time off', 'Devise a world-class Machine Learning platform for the debt management industry\xa0', 'Ability to quickly prototype and test new ideas', 'TrueAccord is distributed company with a major presence in the San Francisco Bay area and Lenexa, KS.\xa0We offer a healthy work environment that continuously builds an inclusive and diverse culture where everyone is able to develop the best version of themselves. We are a dynamic group of people who are subject matter experts with a passion for change.', 'Explain complex Machine Learning concepts to audiences of varied technical backgrounds', 'Formulate and implement technical vision and strategy around Machine Learning', 'Responsibilities:', '*** 401K with matching', 'Formulate and implement technical vision and strategy around Machine LearningDevise a world-class Machine Learning platform for the debt management industry\xa0Continuously improve business impact of our production Machine Learning systemsHunt for quality datasetsRepresent TrueAccord in the Machine Learning communityMentor and guide the Data Science teamWork closely with product leadership, other TrueAccord stakeholders, and clients on models, datasets, and insightsExplain complex Machine Learning concepts to audiences of varied technical backgrounds', 'TrueAccord is an equal opportunity employer. We promote, value, and thrive with a diverse & inclusive team. Different perspectives contribute to better solutions and this makes us stronger every day. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.\xa0', 'As a Chief Scientist, you will act as a visionary who leads technology development for optimizing TrueAccord’s automated debt collection strategies. You will also be the scientific face of TrueAccord to the outside world.', '*** Health, dental and vision benefits', 'Recent experience in building and managing a strong, impactful data science team']

job_text: ['', '  Operate, co-develop and help maintain workflows used in Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) and other bioinformatics pipelines   Development and testing of new methods and development of standard datasets   Rigorous and reproducible data analysis and reporting   Documentation of workflows, protocols and reports for reproducible science   Assist with data and project management   Assist and/or present reports presentations, and manuscripts   Provide support to clients  ', ' Rigorous and reproducible data analysis and reporting ', ' Experience with genome scale or big data analysis derived from Next Generation Sequencing, including some of the following: bulk and single cell RNA-Seq, scDNA-Seq, miRNA, copy number, epigenetics, CITE-Seq and multi-omics integration, is strongly preferred. ', ' Fluency in R/Bioconductor, proficiency in Python is necessary. ', ' Assist and/or present reports presentations, and manuscripts ', 'Organization', 'Duties and Responsibilities ', ' Experience using collaborative development tools such as Git, Confluence and JIRA is preferred. ', ' Solid knowledge of Unix/Linux, command line interfaces is preferred. ', ' Development and testing of new methods and development of standard datasets ', ' Assist with data and project management ', ' Ability to communicate effectively is necessary. ', ' Provide support to clients ', ' Ability to work independently and to show initiative within a team is preferred. ', 'Commitment to Equity, Diversity and Inclusion', 'Primary Location', ' Documentation of workflows, protocols and reports for reproducible science ', 'Unposting Date', ' Strong scientific understanding of molecular biology and genomics; prior work in a dry bench / research laboratory is necessary. ', '  Ph.D. in computational biology, bioinformatics, biostatistics, computer science, or similar discipline OR Master’s degree and 5 or more years’ experience is necessary.   Strong scientific understanding of molecular biology and genomics; prior work in a dry bench / research laboratory is necessary.   Experience with genome scale or big data analysis derived from Next Generation Sequencing, including some of the following: bulk and single cell RNA-Seq, scDNA-Seq, miRNA, copy number, epigenetics, CITE-Seq and multi-omics integration, is strongly preferred.   Solid knowledge of Unix/Linux, command line interfaces is preferred.   Fluency in R/Bioconductor, proficiency in Python is necessary.   Experience using collaborative development tools such as Git, Confluence and JIRA is preferred.   Familiar with public databases and resources available for bioinformatics analysis is preferred.   Experience using high performance computing clusters, specifically SLURM for job management and SnakeMake is preferred.   Familiarity with parallel computing, relational databases (e.g., SQL) and cloud computing or distributed computing (i.e. AWS) is preferred.   Ability to work independently and to show initiative within a team is preferred.   Ability to communicate effectively is necessary.   Excellent attention to detail is necessary.  ', ' Operate, co-develop and help maintain workflows used in Next Generation Sequencing (NGS) and other bioinformatics pipelines ', ' Excellent attention to detail is necessary. ', ' Experience using high performance computing clusters, specifically SLURM for job management and SnakeMake is preferred. ', ' Ph.D. in computational biology, bioinformatics, biostatistics, computer science, or similar discipline OR Master’s degree and 5 or more years’ experience is necessary. ', ' Familiarity with parallel computing, relational databases (e.g., SQL) and cloud computing or distributed computing (i.e. AWS) is preferred. ', ' Familiar with public databases and resources available for bioinformatics analysis is preferred. ']

job_text: ['', 'Building a harmonized schema to feed downstream processing and natural language analysis', 'General Responsibilities', 'Are excited about and suited for a startup, where you’ll be wearing a few hats', 'Are you passionate about architecting data solutions and applying your engineering experience to drive business decisions?\xa0Interested in how organizations use analytics and data to innovate, grow and transform?\xa0Driven to help establish, define, and evangelize how data architecture can help drive a strategy?\xa0', 'Join our fast-growing team!\xa0You will help drive business results through building a robust data engine to build business-critical, scalable, and robust data pipelines and intuitive data products that power data discovery and analysis. You will help build Vee’s data capability and data strategy.', 'About Vee', 'Reports to: CTO', 'Our founders and team have deep expertise in branding, innovation, design, I/O psychology, organization design, digital & data product development, enterprise software and application development complemented by experience with clients ranging from emerging Silicon Valley unicorns to established leaders in government and the public and private sectors including American Express, Bank of America, BMW, Box, HP, Lowe’s, Mastercard, Microsoft, Nissan, Pepsico, Procter & Gamble, SAP and The Clorox Company, among others. For more information, check out our website in transition at https://www.letsvee.com/.', 'Help architect the foundation of Vee’s data capability', 'Position Overview', 'Position: Data Engineer trendsCommunicate results and ideas to key stakeholders at Vee', 'Vee inspires people to align on Purpose so they can unlock their individual and collective human potential. We are an early stage startup poised for dramatic growth. We specialize in developing ways to drive greater strategic alignment to unlock enterprise innovation and growth. After spending considerable time exploring the need for better alignment models across diverse organizations, we have developed a framework and methodology based on insights from extensive research. ['', 'Required Qualifications ', 'At least three (3) years in a geography/ GIS environment developing analytical solutions using advanced spatial statistical methods, application development and deployment, data visualization, and spatial modeling ', 'Experience (2 years) scripting with Python or similar programming language, or experience (2 years) performing statistical analysis using R and/or ESRI GeoStatistical Analyst ', 'At least five (5) years’ experience using ESRI product suite (ArcMap, ArcGIS Pro, ArcCatalog, and ArcGIS Online) including writing SQL expressions for GIS queries ', 'Any combination of the following: GISP, ESRI Certification, Alteryx Certification, Data Science Certificate', 'Experience (4 years) scripting with Python or similar programming language, or experience (4 years) performing statistical analysis using R ', '• providing insightful consultation and recommendations to help drive decision making processes in retail and support by developing analyses, metrics and reports. ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Geography, Geographic Information Systems, Analytics, Information Technology, Computer Science, Statistics, Data Science, Engineering or another analytical discipline from an accredited college or university At least three (3) years in a geography/ GIS environment developing analytical solutions using advanced spatial statistical methods, application development and deployment, data visualization, and spatial modeling At least three (3) years’ experience using ESRI product suite (ArcMap, ArcGIS Pro, ArcCatalog, and ArcGIS Online) including writing SQL expressions for GIS queries Experience (2 years) scripting with Python or similar programming language, or experience (2 years) performing statistical analysis using R and/or ESRI GeoStatistical Analyst Experience (2 years) using Alteryx and/or ESRI Model Builder to automate processes, reports, and application development ', 'Are you interested in applying your GIS and Location Analytics skillset to a fortune 100 retailer? Do you have an innate curiosity to seek out insights and provide recommendations utilizing cutting edge technology and data? Are you looking for a career where site selection, growth, human geography problems come across your desk every day?The Location Analytics Developer consults with business partners to provide research based recommendations in support of strategic decisions for Publix.  This includes managing the development and deployment of analytical solutions by researching and gathering data, performing statistical analyses to glean insights, software coding and training end users on the use and interpretation of these solutions.  The Location Analytics Developer drives results, provides consultation, and end-user application development regarding location-specific recommendations, opportunities, or business initiatives.  These could be in store (market or customer level), in support of multiple business areas, for real estate purchase purposes, alternative business concepts, IS/TS, or merchandising initiatives.  This position is responsible for providing in-depth consultation for these location-specific initiatives, which may be ongoing initiatives.  Location analytics solutions are also developed into user-friendly applications and placed into a self-service Alteryx server or ArcGIS Online platform for business partners to access independently.  By maintaining the Alteryx server, and ArcGIS Online platform, the GIS team is able to continually take on new data requests while current customers are self-maintained.  This allows Developers to have more time to focus on the consultation and application development portion of their position.  Furthermore, this position is responsible for overseeing GIS-related suppliers and providing guidance to GIS Analysts, and continually seeking to gain additional knowledge in data analytics, statistical methods, and predictive/prescriptive modeling.The Location Analytics Developer reports to the GIS Analytics Manager.Responsible for: ', 'Experience (2 years) using Alteryx and/or ESRI Model Builder to automate processes, reports, and application development ', '• developing GIS analytical solutions or applications, actionable tools, and recommendations to assist in making key decisions regarding locations (store, market, customer level), alternative business concept, merchandising initiative, etc. ', '• managing special Marketing related assignments, which can include but is not limited to: ', 'MBA or Masters in Geography, Geographic Information Systems, Analytics, Information Technology, Computer Science, Statistics, Data Science, Engineering, or another analytical discipline from an accredited college or university. At least five (5) years in a geography/ GIS environment developing analytical solutions using advanced spatial statistical methods, application development and deployment, data visualization, and spatial modeling At least five (5) years’ experience using ESRI product suite (ArcMap, ArcGIS Pro, ArcCatalog, and ArcGIS Online) including writing SQL expressions for GIS queries Experience (4 years) scripting with Python or similar programming language, or experience (4 years) performing statistical analysis using R Experience (5 years) using Alteryx or a similar ETL tool to automate processes, reports, and application development Experience with distributed big data tools and processes Any combination of the following: GISP, ESRI Certification, Alteryx Certification, Data Science Certificate', '• coordinating with the Data Scientist, Sr Location Analytics Developers (currently titled MA Senior Consultant) and Mgr GIS & Location Analytics to proactively seek learning and training opportunities regarding predictive regression modeling software for creating regression models (linear, multivariate, logistic, Bayesian, stepwise, prescriptive, etc.), and data visualizations (ESRI, Alteryx, and Tableau). ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Geography, Geographic Information Systems, Analytics, Information Technology, Computer Science, Statistics, Data Science, Engineering or another analytical discipline from an accredited college or university ', 'At least five (5) years in a geography/ GIS environment developing analytical solutions using advanced spatial statistical methods, application development and deployment, data visualization, and spatial modeling ', 'Location Analytics Developer, Marketing, - Lakeland ', '• assigning specific work tasks and training and coaching GIS Data Analysts in best practices in terms of analytical technologies, methodologies, verification, knowledge of data sets, drawing insights, and communicating learnings. ', 'MBA or Masters in Geography, Geographic Information Systems, Analytics, Information Technology, Computer Science, Statistics, Data Science, Engineering, or another analytical discipline from an accredited college or university. ', '• maintaining established data and analytical software and services supplier relationships as assigned to ensure GIS Location Analytics receives ongoing support for those products or services Publix is contracted to receive. ', '• dedicating time to marketing innovation and quality improvement. ', 'Description ', 'Experience (5 years) using Alteryx or a similar ETL tool to automate processes, reports, and application development ', 'Location Analytics Developer, Marketing, - Lakeland', 'At least three (3) years’ experience using ESRI product suite (ArcMap, ArcGIS Pro, ArcCatalog, and ArcGIS Online) including writing SQL expressions for GIS queries ', '• architecting database schemas (blueprint for how data is structured) by developing the logical and physical data models necessary to support the analytical solutions. ', ' ', 'Preferred Qualifications ', 'Experience with distributed big data tools and processes ']

['', 'A postdoctoral position is available in the laboratory of\xa0Dr. Jenna Jewell, in the Department of Molecular Biology at UT Southwestern Medical Center to study glutamine sensing and cancer biology. Our laboratory the\xa0Jewell lab\xa0has several exciting projects related to how organisms sense nutrient fluctuation and respond accordingly to control cell growth, cell proliferation, metabolism, and autophagy. Specifically, we are interested in how the mammalian target of rapamycin complex 1 (mTORC1) senses glutamine in respect to cancer biology.\xa0', 'Information on our postdoctoral training program and benefits can be found in our\xa0Postdoc Handbook\xa0or at\xa0http://www.utsouthwestern.edu/postdocs.\xa0', 'Candidates must hold a Ph.D. and/or M.D. degree. They should be highly motived and have a strong publication record in peer reviewed journals. Experience in molecular biology, biochemistry, and cell biology leading to publication in peer-reviewed journals is recommended.\xa0', 'Interested individuals should send a CV, statement of research interests, description of career goals, and a list of three references to:']

job_title: Researcher I (Part Time)- Microbiology, Immunology, and Biochemistry
company: The University of Tennessee Health Science Center
job_text: ['', 'Duties And Responsibilities', 'Good Laboratory Practices requirements and study protocols.', 'WORK SCHEDULE: ', 'JOB SUMMARY/ESSENTIAL JOB FUNCTIONS:', 'OR', 'Knowledge of Bacteriology, Biochemistry, molecular biology, Immunology, host pathogen interactions, or related discipline. Knowledgeable and well-versed in all MS Office Suite Products. Ability to observe and follow appropriate safety and study requirements by reading, understanding, and performing Standard Operating Procedures. Good Laboratory Practices requirements and study protocols.', 'Completes analyses and presents data/reports using MS Office Suite Products and statistical analysis tools. ', ' (TRANSCRIPT REQUIRED) ', 'Must be able to pass Department of Justice Security Risk Assessment for work with Select Agents and Toxins', 'EDUCATION: ', 'Organization', 'Knowledge of Bacteriology, Biochemistry, molecular biology, Immunology, host pathogen interactions, or related discipline. ', 'Knowledgeable and well-versed in all MS Office Suite Products. ', 'Must be willing to work at BSL3 and ABSL3. Must be willing to work with small animals and/or rodents.', 'Ability to observe and follow appropriate safety and study requirements by reading, understanding, and performing Standard Operating Procedures. ', 'Job Posting', 'Supports all aspects of in vitro/animal studies of pathogens for life history drug studies.', 'Minimum Requirements', 'THIS IS A GRANT-FUNDED POSITION WORKING 20 HOURS PER WEEK.', 'Creates and executes assays to measure and detect viral replications in cell lines and animal tissues and/or fluids.', 'Job', 'Tests the reaction of viruses/viral proteins to antiviral medicines and investigates pathogen responses from other related pathogens to antiviral drugs. ', 'Campus/Institute', 'EXPERIENCE:', 'Primary Location', 'Hiring Range: $18.51 - $22.21/ Hourly ', 'Uses appropriated instrumentation to design, optimize, and/or verify all assays. ', 'Knowledge, Skills, And Abilities', 'Schedule', 'WORK SCHEDULE', 'Performs other related duties as assigned.', 'Establishes protocols and/or Standard Operating Procedures for all techniques utilized, if required.', 'Oversees equipment service inspections and equipment validation process. ', 'Supports the efficacy of experiments conducted in mice with viruses, collection of tissues and endpoint analyses, virus isolation, and isolation/sequencing of viruses. ', 'Monitors and maintains the budget for inventory of supplies and reagents needed to perform scientific experiments. ', 'Publishes and presents data in papers and at internal/external meetings. ', 'Constructs and/or obtains the reagents and technical approaches required for the work.', 'Performs general laboratory housekeeping/maintenance.']

['', "Must possess a strong knowledge as normally obtained through the completion of a bachelor's degree in informatics, statistics, engineering, or a related business discipline.", 'A position in a Banner Health pharmacy is one you can look forward to. Join an engaging environment of full service, high technology and experience a wide variety of responsibilities. You’ll also see how important a pharmacy job is to our ability to make life easier for our patients. Come enjoy great challenges and build both your knowledge of the field and your analytical skills.', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'MINIMUM QUALIFICATIONS', 'Excellent working knowledge of typical word processing, SQL, spreadsheet and/or database applications is required. Strong organizational skills as well as excellent oral and written communication and human relation skills are required. Must have the ability to communicate complex ideas to a non-technical audience.', 'Banner Pharmacy Services provides innovative pharmacy services and coordinated patient care across the continuum leading to improved medication outcomes.\xa0 The Banner Pharmacy Services analytics team has access to state-of-the-art tooling and a comprehensive set of data spanning the care continuum.\xa0 Our mission is to leverage this data to provide better, safer care to the populations we serve, and to drive growth for Banner Pharmacy Services.', 'Experience with department specific software (Cerner, EnterpriseRx, Therigy), including advanced integrated or independent report writing applications. Experience with SAS, Teradata, and/or Tableau. Experience in the pharmacy industry. Advanced knowledge of and experience in program evaluation.', 'A career as an analyst in Banner Pharmacy Services is perfect for an aspiring data scientist looking to hone their skills on a wide array of high-visibility, high-impact projects in a growing business.\xa0 You will be a trusted advisor to senior leaders at Banner Health, and will have the opportunity to present your results directly to key decision-makers.\xa0 While at Arizona’s largest and most comprehensive pharmacy services provider, you will have the chance to make a big impact – both on your career and on the lives of millions of customers.', 'Your pay and benefits (Total Rewards) are important components of your Journey at Banner Health. Banner Health offers a variety of benefit plans to help you and your family. We provide health and financial security options so you can focus on being the best at what you do and enjoying your life.', '\xa0', 'A level of experience as would typically be obtained in no less than 5 years working with complex data environments or systems. Must demonstrate ability to lead project or cross-functional teams to resolve, implement or reach consensus on issues. Advanced business or clinical knowledge and demonstrated ability to utilize technical skills to resolve organizational needs.']

['', 'Making an impact on the world with every line of code', 'An opportunity to learn about the applications of advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to drug discovery and development from the beginning', 'The company', 'Involvement in critical partnerships projects with pharmaceutical clients', 'ReviveMed is an MIT spinout, artificial intelligence (AI)-driven drug discovery platform by uniquely leveraging data form small molecules or metabolites in the human body. Located in the heart of biotech innovation in Cambridge, ReviveMed uniquely overcomes the difficulties of identifying a large set of metabolites for each patient, based on technology that our team developed at MIT and published in Nature Methods. Our AI platform further combines the data from small molecules with other molecular data, and translates these data into novel therapeutic insights for drug discovery. Currently, ReviveMed is collaborating with tier-one pharmaceutical companies and pursuing internal drug discovery, initially focused on metabolic diseases, including non-alcoholic fatty liver.', 'An opportunity to learn about the applications of advanced artificial intelligence algorithms to drug discovery and development from the beginningOpportunities for personal and professional growth as our company expandsInvolvement in critical partnerships projects with pharmaceutical clientsCompetitive compensation, health insurance, as well as share optionsMaking an impact on the world with every line of code', 'Competitive compensation, health insurance, as well as share options', 'The Role', 'Qualifications ', 'PhD or MS degree in Computer Science or related fields; 2-5 years of work experience preferred, but we will consider strong candidates with less experienceExtensive experience in leveraging Deep Learning ( ANN, CNN, RNN, Auto-encoders, GAN, etc.)Strong understanding of the underlying math and learning concepts in these algorithmsProficiency in Python, and familiarity with deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, etc.) and deep learning hardware (CPU, GPU, multi-node)Self-motivated, highly disciplined, passionate about learning, and making a change in the world', 'We are an award-winning enthusiastic team, passionate about innovative, data-driven approaches to bring the right therapeutics for the right patients, and ultimately save millions of lives.', 'Strong understanding of the underlying math and learning concepts in these algorithms', 'Opportunities for personal and professional growth as our company expands', 'Self-motivated, highly disciplined, passionate about learning, and making a change in the world', '\xa0', 'We are looking for an exceptional deep learning data scientist join our exceptional team. We have a fast-paced, high-performance, and result-oriented culture, looking for candidates hungry for learning. The preferred candidate will bring relevant experience, entrepreneurial drive, and a passion for advancing our vision.', 'Proficiency in Python, and familiarity with deep learning frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, etc.) and deep learning hardware (CPU, GPU, multi-node)', 'PhD or MS degree in Computer Science or related fields; 2-5 years of work experience preferred, but we will consider strong candidates with less experience', 'Extensive experience in leveraging Deep Learning ( ANN, CNN, RNN, Auto-encoders, GAN, etc.)', 'Why you should join ReviveMed']

['', 'You have 5+ years of experience in data science in the life science/healthcare industry.', 'You thrive working with messy and complex data, understanding key nuances behind its generation and able to model them with quantitative and machine learning tools to achieve understanding.', 'You are an excellent communicator, able to translate complex analyses into insightful visuals and presentations for audiences with a wide range of technical backgrounds.', 'You are empathetic with end users; proficient at turning business and scientific questions into testable, clean, and reproducible data scientific workflows.', 'You are an avid reader of the literature; excited to try novel tools and techniques to solve problems.', 'You have 5+ years of experience in data science in the life science/healthcare industry.You have a PhD (preferred) or Masters (with 3+ additional years exp) in a quantitative scientific field such as physics, computational biology, chemistry, engineering, etc.You are fluent in python (strongly preferred) or R and cloud native data science.\xa0You thrive working with messy and complex data, understanding key nuances behind its generation and able to model them with quantitative and machine learning tools to achieve understanding.You are an excellent communicator, able to translate complex analyses into insightful visuals and presentations for audiences with a wide range of technical backgrounds.You are empathetic with end users; proficient at turning business and scientific questions into testable, clean, and reproducible data scientific workflows.You have a quick, flexible mind, able to rapidly learn new fields and use data science and machine learning to improve decision making and workflows.You are an avid reader of the literature; excited to try novel tools and techniques to solve problems.', 'You will help to radically lower drug prices and expand access, by identifying novel opportunities for partnerships and delivery across the complex web of interrelationships that bring drugs from pharma companies to patients. You will speed the development and trialing of novel medicines through the unification, comprehension, and modelling of human health and disease across data sources. You will drive the adoption of machine learning for the improvement of human health in building a radically different, digital-native and data-first life sciences company, where we bootstrap our way to rapid increases in scale and efficacy across functions. You will enable experts across EQRx to see further, connecting data from biology and chemistry, to the clinic and patients, to drug pricing and delivery, powering a novel, modern paradigm in drug development.', 'You are fluent in python (strongly preferred) or R and cloud native data science.\xa0', 'You will map and optimize the complex interrelationships of pharma companies, drug manufacturers, pharmacy benefit managers, payors, and patients to drive EQRx’s strategy to dramatically lower drug prices while promoting equity and access. You will use novel computational techniques to design, refine, and select novel drug candidates.\xa0 Using the tools of modern data science and machine learning, you will help to build a data driven, end-to-end digital native life sciences company, enabling our core mission of rapid, equal, and equitable access to medicines.\xa0', "The Impact You'll Have", 'You have a PhD (preferred) or Masters (with 3+ additional years exp) in a quantitative scientific field such as physics, computational biology, chemistry, engineering, etc.', '\xa0', 'Your Superpowers', 'You have a quick, flexible mind, able to rapidly learn new fields and use data science and machine learning to improve decision making and workflows.', 'You will integrate disparate EHR, clinical, claims, and other medical data sources, extracting consistent information across ontologies, and deriving insights from disparate data sources to allow experts to rapidly understand the meaning, applicability, and extensibility of results from observational and randomized clinical experimentation. You will build ML tools for anomaly-tracking to enable rapid, more effective clinical trialing and the integration of data sources throughout the life sciences.\xa0 You will model the trajectory of disease across patient populations to identify key opportunities and indications and to rapidly test and develop candidate medicines.']

job_title: Research Scientist - Spring Wheat Breeding Program
job_text: ['', ' Field data recording and collection of research samples using scientifically prescribed methods.', ' Follow all university rules and policies.', ' A record of publication in refereed journals.', ' Effective communication skills to disseminate research information to diverse audiences.', ' Planning, design, and implementation of greenhouse, laboratory, and field research projects.  Field data recording and collection of research samples using scientifically prescribed methods.  Data compilation, entry and analysis, interpretation and summation of research results.  Genotypic and/or phenotypic plant, headrow, and plot selection for desired characters.  Hands on participation in planting, plot management, sampling, evaluation, selection, and harvest operations.  Supervision and coordination of project personnel.  Travel to, and evaluation of, spring wheat trials and germplasm at diverse Montana research sites.  Pure seed increases of wheat lines targeted for variety release. Required Qualifications – Experience, Education, Knowledge & Skills  PH.D. degree in Plant Breeding, Plant Genetics, or related field.  Documented experience using modern plant breeding techniques and breeding tools for cultivar development.  A record of publication in refereed journals. Preferred Qualifications – Experience, Education, Knowledge & Skills  Postdoctoral research experience in plant genetics or related field.  Effective communication skills to disseminate research information to diverse audiences.  Demonstrated experience supervising employees, including student employees and/or temporary labor.  Evidence of potential or previous success in obtaining competitive research funding.  Potential for excellence in teaching and mentoring students.  Experience with off-season nurseries and/or rapid generation advancement. The Successful Candidate WillThe Successful Candidate Will Have Effective written, oral, and interpersonal communication skills.  Time management skills and be detail oriented.  Follow all university rules and policies.  The ability to work both independently and collaboratively with co-workers. Position Special Requirements/Additional Information  Must be willing to work outside of traditional business hours when research protocols dictate.  Must have or be able to obtain a valid State of Montana drivers license as travel will be required. Physical Demands  Maneuver 60 pounds.  Navigate rough terrain for long periods of time.  Work in inclement weather conditions for long periods of time.  Work in and around dust, pollen-bearing plants, and agricultural pesticides.  Work with and around loud equipment and heavy machinery.  Work in inclement weather – hot or cold and work more than 40 hours per week as needed during planting and harvesting.  Must be able to safely enter, exit and operate numerous types of farm and research scale machinery unsupervised.  Must be able to safely and effectively use seed cleaning and seed processing machinery.  Must be able to drive a pick-up truck while towing trailers or farm implements.To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily with or without reasonable accommodations. The requirements listed above are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required.Yes Number Of Vacancies Desired Start Date Position End Date (if Temporary) Open Date Close Date Applications Will BeThis position has supervisory duties.Screening of applications will begin on 09/15/2020; however, applications will continue to be accepted until an adequate applicant pool has been established.Special InstructionsTo ApplyUpload your curriculum vita or resume and a cover letter outlining how you meet each individual required and preferred qualification.Please note, this posting requires contact information for three professional references within your app profile.Diversity StatementMontana State University values diverse perspectives and is committed to continually supporting, promoting and building an inclusive and culturally diverse campus environment. ['Education', 'The health and safety of our employees and candidates is very important to us. Spectrum has adopted virtual mobile recruiting tools that allow us to continue meeting new candidates. We look forward to “virtually” meeting you.The Spectrum brands (including Spectrum Networks, Spectrum Enterprise and Spectrum Reach) are powered and innovated by Charter Communications. Charter Communications reaffirms its commitment to providing equal opportunities for employment and advancement to qualified employees and applicants. Individuals will be considered for positions for which they meet the minimum qualifications and are able to perform without regard to race, color, gender, age, religion, disability, national origin, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, or any other basis protected by federal, state or local laws.', 'REQUIRED QUALIFICATIONS', 'PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS', "Company Overview:Charter Communications is America’s fastest growing TV, internet and voice company. We’re committed to integrating the highest quality service with superior entertainment and communications products. Charter is at the intersection of technology and entertainment, facilitating essential communications that connect 24 million residential and business customers in 41 states. Our commitment to serving customers and exceeding their expectations is the bedrock of Charter’s business strategy and it’s the philosophy that guides our 90,000 employees.JOB SUMMARYThe Advanced Analytics group has implemented and is operating a new advanced Big Data analytics platform that enables new self-service analytics, decision engineering support, machine learning, modeling, forecasting, and optimizations in Charter’s Advanced Engineering organization. This position is responsible to create and maintain scalable, reliable, consistent and repeatable platforms, systems, and models that support data, data products, and analytical products for advanced analytics by gathering, processing, exploring, and modeling raw and diverse data at scale. It requires lifecycle management of multiple data sources, data discovery, and models. This position architects and delivers models, analytics, automation, and self-service, which are major tenets of the analytics platform.The most successful candidate will have lifecycle experience in machine learning, deep learning, and/or artificial intelligence within modern parallel environments, such as GPU-enabled platforms and distributed clusters. This lifecycle includes conceiving, developing, prototyping, analyzing, and implementing models with very large (i.e., the top end of big data) and diverse datasets and in collaboration with stakeholders. Desirable experience includes using big data platforms for sources (e.g., Snowflake, AWS/s3, and Hadoop) to create deep learning and machine learning models with GPU-based Python (e.g., NVIDIA/DGX/RAPIDS).MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIESFrames and models meaningful business and engineering scenarios that impact critical business and engineering processes, architectures, and/or decisionsResearches, develops, and implements machine learning models, deep learning models, artificial intelligence, and algorithms that solve business and engineering problemsDevelops innovative and effective approaches to solve model problems while communicating the results and methodologiesLeverages multiple data sources to produce products that solve the needs of business and engineering for descriptive models, predictive models, diagnostic models, and prescriptive modelsApplies data mining, data discovery, machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence techniques to large structured and unstructured datasets for model creationGathers and processes raw data at scale from any source and in any formatBalances workloads and operational demands with open source technologies, cloud services, and commercial solutions while optimizing cost and time-to-solution demandsCreates highly reusable code modules, templates, and packages that can be leveraged across model lifecycleIncreases speed to delivery by architecting and implementing automated solutionsMentors, educates, and provides senior leadership to data scientists, data analysts, and data engineersREQUIRED QUALIFICATIONSAbility to create proof of concept experiments for analytics, machine learning, or visualization tools that includes hypothesis, test plans, and outcome analysis.Ability to create unsupervised and supervised models. Time series expertise is a plus.Solid statistical knowledge and techniques.Exceptional programming skills in PythonExperience with one of the deep learning frameworks, such as TensorFlow or PyTorch.Develop highly scalable systems, algorithms, and tools to support machine learning, deep learning, and artificial intelligence solutions.Lifecycle management using Docker and containerization.Experience with Snowflake, AWS, Hadoop, and/or Spark.Excellent pattern recognition and predictive modeling skills.Extracting data and delivering complete analytics and machine learning products primarily using Python; secondary experience with R, Java, Javascript, C, C++, Scala, or Julia is an asset.Work closely with other data scientists, data engineers, and systems/infrastructure teams to deploy end-to-end models capable of serving production traffic in real-time.Develop, integrate and optimize model/AI/ML/DL pipelines.Leverage modern parallel environments, e.g. distributed clusters, multicore SMP, GPU, TPU and FPGA.Design and implement feedback loops for continual model updates and improvementsExperience receiving, converting, and cleansing big data.Visualization or BI tools, such as Tableau, Microstrategy, RapidMiner, or anything Microsoft Power BI.Program, product, or project management experience delivering model and analytics results.Strong background in Linux/Unix/CentOS/MacOS and Windows installation and administration.Keen attention to detail with the ability to effectively prioritize and execute multiple tasks.Ability to read, write, speak and understand English.PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONSJupyter Notebooks, NVIDIA GPU-based Deep Learning, and NVIDIA RAPIDS.Familiarity with APIs: Javascript API, Rest API or Data Extract APIs.Familiarity with data workflow/data prep platforms, such as Alteryx, Pentaho, or KNIME.Familiarity with DevOps/CI/CD/automation/configuration/orchestration management using Puppet, Chef, Ansible, Jenkins, Kubernetes, Airflow, or equivalents.Knowledge of best practices and IT operations in an always-up, always-available service.Knowledge of Agile, Scrum, and SAFe environments. Experience delivering within these environment a plus.EducationBachelor's degree in a data science, engineering discipline, computer science, statistics, applied math, or related field required.Master’s degree in a data science, engineering discipline, computer science, statistics, applied math, or related field preferred.Related Work Experience3-5+ years of experience in one or more of the following areas: machine learning, deep learning, recommendation systems, natural language processing, fraud detection or artificial intelligence3-5+ years of experience of lifecycle management in one or more of the following from idea to deployment: artificial intelligence, deep learning models, machine learning models, recommendation systems, natural language processing, or fraud detection.3-5+ years of experience in data engineering position and/or software development.Experience delivering multiple systems where candidate was responsible for designing the architecture, implementing, operating, supporting, and managing the release lifecycle from inception to end of life.7-10+ years of hands-on working experience with Python, RDBMS, SQL, scripting, and coding.Proven experience in translating insights into business recommendations.WORKING CONDITIONSCharter Technical Engineering CenterHighly collaborative and innovative work spaceOccasional Travel ", 'Company Overview:', 'MAJOR DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES', 'JOB SUMMARY', 'WORKING CONDITIONS', 'Related Work Experience']

['', ' You work with confidence and without ego. Our data scientists have deep knowledge and exercise a high degree of leadership in their daily work. You have strongly-held, defensible ideas, and advocate for what you believe is right. You are also adept at identifying and evaluating trade-offs, willing to be proven wrong, and quick to walk through fire to support your fellow teammates.', ' You have an abundance of intellectual curiosity and are enthusiastic to learn (and teach) new technologies / techniques.', ' You have experience with big data technologies such as Spark or AWS; are able to write efficient SQL; and are proficient in one or more of the following programming languages: R, Python, Java, or Scala. Variety of technical challenge is one of the best things about working at The Trade Desk as a data scientist though which is why we do not expect you to know every technology we use when you start. What we care about is that you can learn quickly and solve complex problems using the best tools for the job.', ' You are a broadly skilled data scientist with experience embedding models into always-on production systems, working across a variety of technologies and data sources.', ' Lead Senior Data Scientists serve both as technical individual contributors and people managers. You will be responsible for owning a technical area as well as building and nurturing a team.', 'WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING:', ' You are you comfortable working on an agile, distributed team spanning multiple time zones and continents.', " You have a sustained track record of making significant, self-directed, and end-to-end contributions to large and impactful machine learning projects. You think beyond just the task at hand to deeply understand the 'why' behind what you are doing.", " You have a strong sense of data intuition. At our scale, many off-the-shelf modeling techniques (open source and enterprise) simply don't work. You are able to work from first principles and intuition to develop solutions and adapt them to a unique environment.", 'WHO WE ARE LOOKING FOR:', ' You are a creative thinker, not bound by "the way things have always been done." What you know is less important than how well you learn and innovate. We don\'t need data scientists who know all the answers; we need data scientists who can invent the answers no one has thought of yet, to the questions yet to be asked.', ' You value, seek out, and foster diversity. We are a global team from many diverse backgrounds, with different experiences and perspectives. To complement this team, you will welcome ideas that are different from your own and be skilled at finding and building from common ground.', 'WHAT YOU BRING TO THE TABLE:', ' Lead Senior Data Scientists are end-to-end owners. You will participate actively in all aspects of designing, researching, building, and delivering data-focused products for our clients.', ' You are able to communicate effectively across both technical and non-technical audiences.', ' You are a driver. You will be driving technical projects and providing leadership in a ground-breaking and fast-paced environment. This includes task planning and conducting code reviews, as well as individual code contribution.', ' You have a product-focused mindset. You have the passion and ability to contribute to the process of discovering what will delight our clients and push forward one of the world’s largest and most influential industries toward a vision of openness, transparency, and evidence-based decision-making.', ' You have over 10 years of experience working in a data-driven role, including leading large and impactful technical projects. You may have an advanced degree in a quantitative field, but it’s not a requirement. What and how you can contribute is what’s most important to us which is why our consideration is not limited by the level of education you have.', 'WHO WE ARE:', ' Our Data Science team is embedded into nearly a dozen individual, mission-focused engineering teams working across a wide spectrum of technological and scientific challenges. You will have the opportunity, depending on your interests and background, to own problems related to natural language processing and machine learning over hundreds of millions of web pages, graph mining and algorithmic optimization on petabytes of data, and causal inference with missing data - to name a few.', ' Lead Senior Data Scientists contribute to more than our product – they build up our team. Through a combination of mentoring, technical leadership, and direct people-management, they make others better and raise the bar for those around them.']

['', 'From your side, our client will be looking for engineers that live and breathe data. Specifically, it would be perfect if you have worked with data to accurately model and analyze complex systems (e.g. publicly traded companies, commodity markets, economy, or financial instruments). A strong interest in the financial markets is a must-have too! I would be interested to know if you trade in your spare time.', 'Python expert ', ' lead projects end-to-end', 'If you can program in one or more languages that is great, although being a Python expert would put you at the top of the list! Happy to discuss more following your application.', ' the best data platforms the industry has to offer.', 'worked with data to accurately model and analyze complex systems', 'live and breathe data', 'highest performing trading teams', 'In recent years, data has become an integral cog of the investment machine. It will be your responsibility to drive the evolution of their data strategy by challenging the status quo and identifying opportunities to enhance existing work.']

job_title: Senior Machine Learning Engineer - Activision Blizzard Media
job_text: ['', ' BA/BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience. 7+ years of hands- on experience in software design and development. Advance level expertise in Java Development. 2+ years of experience in working with relational databases such as MySQL, Postgres etc. 2+ years of experience in NoSQL databases like Bigtable, Cassandra, HBase etc. Experience with schema design and data modeling. Strong understanding of large- scale distributed data processing. Experience with developing extract- transform- load (ETL). Experience with distributed messaging systems like Kafka and RabbitMQ Experience with distributed computing framework like Apache Spark and Flink. ', '7+ years of hands- on experience in software design and development.', 'Identify new data sources and features and collects large data sets to build new models.', 'Level Up - Your Role With Activision Blizzard Media', 'Job Description', 'Mine and analyze data to improve product capabilities and help the team to come up with the new products.', 'Experience with distributed computing framework like Apache Spark and Flink.', 'Ready to Play? Apply now!', 'Game Changer - What You Bring To The Role', '2+ years of experience in working with relational databases such as MySQL, Postgres etc.', 'Develop and maintain the necessary infrastructure to run and maintain the algorithms.', 'Knowledge of advertising platform.', 'Work as the lead data strategist to identify compelling patterns and come up with the solutions.', ' Work as the lead data strategist to identify compelling patterns and come up with the solutions. Mine and analyze data to improve product capabilities and help the team to come up with the new products. Identify new data sources and features and collects large data sets to build new models. Aggregate huge amounts of data and information from large numbers of sources to discover patterns and features necessary to build machine learning models for prediction and forecasting. Design and implement end- to- end solutions using Machine Learning, Optimization, and other advanced computer science technologies, and own live deployments to drive advertising conversion. Improve the run- time of existing algorithms. Develop and maintain the necessary infrastructure to run and maintain the algorithms. Develop a feedback system to improve the selection of features for the algorithms. ', 'Experience with developing extract- transform- load (ETL).', 'Experience with distributed messaging systems like Kafka and RabbitMQ', " Experience working with AWS or Google Cloud Platform (GCP) Understanding of machine learning concepts and some experience in working with machine Learning libraries. Experience in building data warehouse and data lake. Knowledge of advertising platform.About Activision And Our Family Of BrandsActivision Blizzard, Inc. (NASDAQ: ATVI), is one of the world's largest and most successful interactive entertainment companies and is at the intersection of media, technology and entertainment. Our combined entertainment network delights hundreds of millions of monthly active users in 196 countries, making us the largest gaming network on the planet!Activision develops, distributes, and publishes deeply immersive interactive entertainment for gaming consoles, mobile and tablet platforms, and PCs, including blockbuster franchises like Call of Duty® and Skylanders®.Blizzard Entertainment develops, distributes and publishes some of the most iconic entertainment experiences in gaming, such as World of Warcraft®, StarCraft®, Diablo®, Hearthstone®, and Heroes of the Storm™, for PCs, mobile and tablet platforms, and consoles.King Digital Entertainment creates leading interactive entertainment for the mobile world. With more than 200 fun titles, King's franchises include Candy Crush ®, Farm Heroes®, Pet Rescue®, and Bubble Witch®.Ready to Play? Apply now!Come join our world and work alongside some of the best and brightest minds in the business.All applications should be made in English.", 'Advance level expertise in Java Development.', 'Experience with schema design and data modeling.', 'Understanding of machine learning concepts and some experience in working with machine Learning libraries.', 'Aggregate huge amounts of data and information from large numbers of sources to discover patterns and features necessary to build machine learning models for prediction and forecasting.', 'Develop a feedback system to improve the selection of features for the algorithms.', 'Experience in building data warehouse and data lake.', 'Responsibilities', 'Experience working with AWS or Google Cloud Platform (GCP)', 'About Activision And Our Family Of Brands', '2+ years of experience in NoSQL databases like Bigtable, Cassandra, HBase etc.', 'Design and implement end- to- end solutions using Machine Learning, Optimization, and other advanced computer science technologies, and own live deployments to drive advertising conversion.', 'Improve the run- time of existing algorithms.', 'Strong understanding of large- scale distributed data processing.', 'BA/BS degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study or equivalent practical experience.']

['', 'EQUAL EMPLOYMENT OPPORTUNITY (EEO) STATEMENT', 'Python', '5+ years’ experience preferably in the medical device or a similarly regulated industry.', 'Sr. Data Engineer', 'While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to type at a keyboard and produce working computer software.', 'Experienced implementing production-grade big data solutions on Amazon Web Services', 'We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity in our company.\xa0We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', '5+ years’ experience preferably in the medical device or a similarly regulated industry.PythonExperience with EHR/EMR integrations via HL7 or FHIR is a plusExperience implementing and documenting any of the following standards as it pertains to cloud infrastructure and ETL solutions: Soc2, ISO 27001/27002, HITRUST, PCI DSS, NIST 800-5, FEDRAMP.Familiarity with Agile methodologyResponsible for performing all duties in compliance with FDA’s Quality System Regulation (QSR), ISO13485, ISO 14971, the Canadian Medical Device Regulations, and all other international regulatory requirements with which Potrero Medical complies.', 'While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to talk or hear and participate in conference calls', 'At Potrero Medical, our mission is to help clinicians transform patient care by developing a predictive technology platform for supporting the early detection of critical illnesses.', 'This role will implement pipelines to extract, transform and load data from various sources, including data downloaded from medical devices used in clinical trials, as well as the electronic medical record (EMR). The pipelines are then used by Potrero data scientists to develop predictive health algorithms that run on Potrero medical devices. This position will build and maintain data tools to support the analytics and clinical teams in working with the data.\xa0Finally, the role will ensure that the data infrastructure is secure and in compliance with recognized cybersecurity standards, including required documentation and testing.', 'Experienced implementing production-grade big data solutions on Amazon Web ServicesExperience with relational or analytics databases (Postgres and Redshift or Snowflake).Experience with an IAC language such as Terraform for provisioning cloud microservices in containerized environments.Experience moving data (ETL)Ability to modify or write scripts with pandas, NumPy, or bokeh that move data or provide visualizations.Familiar with HIPAA regulationsPerform additional responsibilities or other functions as assigned', 'Familiarity with Agile methodology', 'We are a Silicon Valley-based predictive health company developing the next generation of medical devices with smart sensors and artificial intelligence. Founded in the historical Potrero Hill neighborhood of San Francisco, we emerged out of Theranova, a MedTech incubator focused on tackling the biggest challenges in healthcare.', 'Our medical device, the Accuryn® Monitoring System, received 510(k) clearance from the FDA in 2016 and helps hospitals accurately measure patients’ vital signs such as urine output, body core temperature, and intra-abdominal pressure.', 'This job operates in a professional office environment, it can be performed remotely.', 'WORK ENVIRONMENT', 'This job operates in a professional office environment, it can be performed remotely.This role routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers, phones, photocopiers, filing cabinets and fax machines.', 'Perform additional responsibilities or other functions as assigned', 'The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job.', 'ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS\xa0(Included but not limited to)', 'REQUIREMENTS', 'The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job.While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to talk or hear and participate in conference callsWhile performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to type at a keyboard and produce working computer software.The employee is occasionally required to sit; balance; and stoop, kneel, or crouch. The employee must frequently lift and/or move up to 10 pounds and occasionally lift and/or move up to 25 pounds. Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision, distance vision, color vision, peripheral vision, depth perception and ability to adjust focus.', 'Responsible for performing all duties in compliance with FDA’s Quality System Regulation (QSR), ISO13485, ISO 14971, the Canadian Medical Device Regulations, and all other international regulatory requirements with which Potrero Medical complies.', '\xa0', 'Experience moving data (ETL)', 'ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS', 'EDUCATION', 'Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.', 'PHYSICAL DEMANDS', 'Familiar with HIPAA regulations', 'This role routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers, phones, photocopiers, filing cabinets and fax machines.', 'The employee is occasionally required to sit; balance; and stoop, kneel, or crouch. The employee must frequently lift and/or move up to 10 pounds and occasionally lift and/or move up to 25 pounds. Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision, distance vision, color vision, peripheral vision, depth perception and ability to adjust focus.', 'Experience implementing and documenting any of the following standards as it pertains to cloud infrastructure and ETL solutions: Soc2, ISO 27001/27002, HITRUST, PCI DSS, NIST 800-5, FEDRAMP.', 'Experience with EHR/EMR integrations via HL7 or FHIR is a plus', 'POSITION DESCRIPTION', 'Experience with an IAC language such as Terraform for provisioning cloud microservices in containerized environments.', 'BS in computer science or similar field.', 'Experience with relational or analytics databases (Postgres and Redshift or Snowflake).', 'Ability to modify or write scripts with pandas, NumPy, or bokeh that move data or provide visualizations.']
