job_title: Principal Research Scientist - Health Communications Research
company: NORC at the University of Chicago
job_text: ['Ability to work in fast paced, multi-tasking environment across multiple projects', 'NORC is an affirmative action, equal opportunity employer that values and actively seeks diversity in the workforce. NORC evaluates qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, and other legally- protected characteristics.', 'PhD degree in marketing, communications, or a related field is preferred; Master’s degree is required', 'At least 12 years of experience in the leadership of research project teams including responsibility for budget development, performance monitoring, project quality control, and team and client/sponsor communication', 'NORC at the University of Chicago is an objective, non-partisan research institution that delivers reliable data and rigorous analysis to guide critical programmatic, business, and policy decisions. Since 1941, our teams have conducted groundbreaking studies, created and applied innovative methods and tools, and advanced principles of scientific integrity and collaboration. Today, government, corporate, and nonprofit clients around the world partner with us to transform increasingly complex information into useful knowledge.', 'NORC at the University of Chicago is\xa0seeking a highly experienced Principal Research Scientist with a strong background in health marketing/communications research and strategic business development to be based in our Sacramento, California office. We are also open to someone working from a different California location. The position will be based in the Health Care Programs Research Department and will work collaboratively across the Health Care, Public Health, and Health Sciences Research Departments at NORC. The\xa0main focus of this position will be on providing leadership to California-focused projects and on expanding NORC’s client base in the state.\xa0', 'NORC’s expertise and ongoing work in health care delivery and financing — including access to insurance, payment and delivery-system reform, benefit design, and quality measurement — advance stakeholders’ understanding of policies and programs, facilitate implementation, and contribute to important improvements in cost and quality.', 'Assume responsibility for the technical and scientific oversight of studies as well performance monitoring, quality control, and contract/budget adherence.', 'Contribute to health policy, behavioral, program evaluation, and other types of health studies.', 'Proficiency in survey research as well as qualitative methods', 'The NORC health communication research practice combines a focus on both public health and health care with a commitment to the development of culturally-sensitive, scientifically-based programs that make full use of web and new media in addition to more traditional communication channels.\xa0 Supplementing their national level experience, practice group research professionals bring deep experience within California and other state as well as local health systems. The group is also able to draw on NORC’s historic leadership in survey research and a large number of in-house experts on a wide array of health topics, populations, and research methods.', 'Demonstrated success in leading business development efforts, especially in strategy development, outreach and relationship management in addition to the preparation of proposals/bids\xa0 \xa0', 'Provide leadership in California business development for NORC including strategy development, identification of opportunities, and outreach to potential clients and partners.Independently design and direct health marketing/communications research and evaluation studies and work in collaboration with communications firms and clients to develop and refine strategies and plans based on research findings.Assume responsibility for the technical and scientific oversight of studies as well performance monitoring, quality control, and contract/budget adherence.Contribute to health policy, behavioral, program evaluation, and other types of health studies.Participate as an active member of project teams e.g. in the design of data collection protocols, data analysis/interpretation, and reporting.Provide oversight and mentoring to junior staff.', 'EEO STATEMENT:\xa0', 'Occasional travel for site visits and meetings may be required.\xa0', 'PhD degree in marketing, communications, or a related field is preferred; Master’s degree is requiredAt least 12 years\xa0of experience in health marketing/communication studies including both formative and outcome evaluation studiesAt least 12 years of experience in the leadership of research project teams including responsibility for budget development, performance monitoring, project quality control, and team and client/sponsor communicationHigh level of technical competence in study design, data collection protocol development, data analysis, and reporting of findingsProficiency in survey research as well as qualitative methodsDemonstrated success in leading business development efforts, especially in strategy development, outreach and relationship management in addition to the preparation of proposals/bids\xa0 \xa0Ability to work in fast paced, multi-tasking environment across multiple projectsExcellent written and interpersonal communication skillsStrong problem solving, project leadership, and relationship management skillsSubstantive expertise on multiple public health and health care topics; in the health care area, expertise on the Affordable Care Act and the promotion of health insurance coverage is highly desirablePublication track record strongly preferredOccasional travel for site visits and meetings may be required.\xa0', 'Excellent written and interpersonal communication skills', 'Provide leadership in California business development for NORC including strategy development, identification of opportunities, and outreach to potential clients and partners.', 'NORC’s health communication research practice offers a full range of research, planning, and evaluation services to clients. This practice group is comprised of communication researchers who specialize in formative research including media/environmental scans; social media listening and analysis; audience descriptive and segmentation studies; concept development research; message and materials testing; and web usability research. This group also has expertise in the development of evidence-based communication strategies as well as campaign measurement, evaluation, and effectiveness studies. The group is highly experienced in the design and evaluation of advertising and earned media campaigns as well as those that entail social mobilization, materials distribution, and other elements.', 'High level of technical competence in study design, data collection protocol development, data analysis, and reporting of findings', 'WHAT WE DO:', 'Substantive expertise on multiple public health and health care topics; in the health care area, expertise on the Affordable Care Act and the promotion of health insurance coverage is highly desirable', 'Participate as an active member of project teams e.g. in the design of data collection protocols, data analysis/interpretation, and reporting.', 'NORC recognizes that talented and skilled researchers live throughout the U.S. and actively supports remote work arrangements.\xa0 Post-COVID, occasional trips to client sites or the office may be required. This position will align with our Sacramento, California office administratively.', 'Provide oversight and mentoring to junior staff.', '\xa0', 'Independently design and direct health marketing/communications research and evaluation studies and work in collaboration with communications firms and clients to develop and refine strategies and plans based on research findings.', 'REQUIRED SKILLS:', 'NORC’s expert staff has extensive knowledge of all aspects of health care delivery, from private marketplaces and employer-sponsored insurance to Medicare and Medicaid; from large health care systems to small clinics; and from the needs of children to those of older adults, people with disabilities, and ethnic and racial minorities. Our expert team includes social scientists that acquire, collect, and analyze data from health care organizations and patients; evaluators; health services researchers; health-policy analysts; and professionals with first-hand experience running and supporting health care programs', 'DEPARTMENT: Health Care Programs', 'At least 12 years\xa0of experience in health marketing/communication studies including both formative and outcome evaluation studies', 'Strong problem solving, project leadership, and relationship management skills', 'RESPONSIBILITIES:', 'Publication track record strongly preferred', 'WHO WE ARE:', 'For over 75 years, NORC has evolved in many ways, moving the needle with research methods, technical applications and groundbreaking research findings. But our tradition of excellence, passion for innovation, and commitment to collegiality have remained constant components of who we are as a brand, and who each of us is as a member of the NORC team. With world-class benefits, a business casual environment, and an emphasis on continuous learning, NORC is a place where people join for the stellar research and analysis work for which we’re known, and stay for the relationships they form with their colleagues who take pride in the impact their work is making on a global scale.']

job_title: Senior Research Scientist - Nanoparticles and Formulation

['', 'Conduct end-to-end research, utilizing a wide variety of methodologies (both, qual and quant), to help us gain confidence in our understanding of our users (current and future), their needs and the opportunity this uncovers for our products.', 'Overview', '7+ years of work experience as a marketing researcher, preferably in the technology sector. Experience on the vendor side is also applicable.', 'Proven ability to use customer insights to drive a holistic marketing strategy.', 'Work closely with marketing teams and product leaders to define the most important research questions, lead research, facilitate synthesis to get to compelling insights, and finally turn the insights into action.', 'Define the most important insights that drive seamless customer experiences and delight and work with Marketing to action these and translate them into business impact.', 'Conduct end-to-end research, utilizing a wide variety of methodologies (both, qual and quant), to help us gain confidence in our understanding of our users (current and future), their needs and the opportunity this uncovers for our products.Work closely with marketing teams and product leaders to define the most important research questions, lead research, facilitate synthesis to get to compelling insights, and finally turn the insights into action.Define the most important insights that drive seamless customer experiences and delight and work with Marketing to action these and translate them into business impact.', '7+ years of work experience as a marketing researcher, preferably in the technology sector. Experience on the vendor side is also applicable.Experience with various qualitative and quantitative research methodologies such as ethnography, contextual interviews, surveys, conjoint, customer journeys and more.Proven ability to use customer insights to drive a holistic marketing strategy.Ability to distill research findings into clear, and compelling data backed presentations, data visualizations, and/or infographics.Great interpersonal skills to collaborate with a wide diversity of colleagues in other disciplines and cultures.Familiarity with design thinking and lean experimentation is a plus.', 'How You Will Lead', 'Experience with various qualitative and quantitative research methodologies such as ethnography, contextual interviews, surveys, conjoint, customer journeys and more.', 'Ability to distill research findings into clear, and compelling data backed presentations, data visualizations, and/or infographics.', 'Great interpersonal skills to collaborate with a wide diversity of colleagues in other disciplines and cultures.', "What You'll Bring", 'Familiarity with design thinking and lean experimentation is a plus.']

['EQRx believes responsibility can be revolutionary. Want to make a difference while advancing your career? Come join a team that is working towards our bold mission of developing innovative medicines at radically low prices to help people get the medicines they need.', '', 'You will build tools and processes for the ingestion and storage of data for a modern, data-driven and digital-native life sciences company, from drug and molecule development, to the clinic and patient data, to drug pricing and management, integrating across numerous data types and modalities. The Data Engineer will construct data infrastructure to support data science, analytics, and visualization uniting data across disparate sources and scales, from small ad hoc datasets to million+ patient claims and EHR datasets.', 'You have 5+ years of data engineering experience in industry or equivalent.You have experience working in health care, life sciences, and/or with scientific data.You are fluent in SQL and scripting languages.You intuitively think of how to organize, normalize, and store complex data, enabling both ETL and end users.You have a curious mind, constantly looking into novel approaches for the organization of complex life scientific data, e.g. FHIR for clinical data.You thrive on mapping and designing ingestion and transformation of data from multiple sources, creating a cohesive data asset.You are an expert in modern cloud data warehousing tools (e.g. BigQuery, Snowflake) and ETL tools (e.g. Stitch, Fivetran, DBT).You are an excellent communicator, empathetic with end users and internal customers.\xa0', 'You are fluent in SQL and scripting languages.', 'This role will help build a novel model of life sciences company, where data is stored and integrated across functions, informing every process from the beginning. You will speed the development and trialing of novel medicines by bringing a digital and data native technology stack to drug development. You will connect and integrate data sources that map the complex web of interrelationships that bring drugs to patients and empower experts to explore them.\xa0You will enable experts across EQRx to see further, connecting data from biology and chemistry, to the clinic and patients, to drug pricing and delivery, powering a modern, and radically new paradigm in drug development, bringing cheaper and more accessible medicines to the market.', 'You intuitively think of how to organize, normalize, and store complex data, enabling both ETL and end users.', 'You are an expert in modern cloud data warehousing tools (e.g. BigQuery, Snowflake) and ETL tools (e.g. Stitch, Fivetran, DBT).', "The Impact You'll Have", 'You will map across different clinical data systems and ontologies to build common reference datasets. You will design and build consistent, reproducible, and testable ETL pipelines to ingest, normalize, and store data from large healthcare datasets, from clinical trials, to claims, and EHRs. You will also support the scaling, versioning, and usage of data science and machine learning to produce insights form data.', "What You'll Do", 'You have 5+ years of data engineering experience in industry or equivalent.', 'You have a curious mind, constantly looking into novel approaches for the organization of complex life scientific data, e.g. FHIR for clinical data.', 'You thrive on mapping and designing ingestion and transformation of data from multiple sources, creating a cohesive data asset.', '\xa0', 'Your Superpowers', 'You are an excellent communicator, empathetic with end users and internal customers.\xa0', 'You have experience working in health care, life sciences, and/or with scientific data.']

['Develop an understanding of Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform and proprietary datasetsUse your machine learning expertise to research and recommend the best approaches to solving our technology and business problemsDesign, implement, and validate your solutions in Apache Spark and Apache Hive using Scala or Python on large state-of-the-art computing clusters.Work with our Engineering teams to integrate your solutions into Epsilon’s CORE Personalization PlatformParticipate fully in our collaborative approach to research and applications projects', 'RESPONSIBILITIES', 'Participate fully in our collaborative approach to research and applications projects', 'Develop an understanding of Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform and proprietary datasets', 'Use your machine learning expertise to research and recommend the best approaches to solving our technology and business problems', 'External Title:', 'As a Data Scientist in our Decision Sciences R&D organization, you will be responsible for researching and building machine learning, natural language processing, and recommender system applications to extend\xa0Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform. Epsilon CORE Personalization Platform analyzes anonymized data at Internet scale and evaluates more than one trillion advertising opportunities per month in real-time. You will work on real-world problems as part of our highly collaborative R&D team, and your solutions will directly and rapidly impact our business.\xa0This includes analyzing raw source data and derived data,\xa0researching and developing models, algorithms, and applications,\xa0building tools and analyses for new and existing products\xa0and presenting findings.', 'Internal Title:', 'Design, implement, and validate your solutions in Apache Spark and Apache Hive using Scala or Python on large state-of-the-art computing clusters.', 'Work with our Engineering teams to integrate your solutions into Epsilon’s CORE Personalization Platform', 'External Title: Data Scientist\xa0Internal Title: Decision Science, Scientist\xa0']

job_title: Postdoctoral Researcher - Materials Development and Device Fabrication
job_text: ['', ' Characterize membrane and electrode materials and assemblies by X-ray diffraction (XRD), X-ray spectroscopy (EDS, XRF, XPS), and electron microscopy (SEM, TEM).', 'Security Clearance: ', ' Pursue independent but complementary research interests and interact with a broad spectrum of scientists internally and externally to the Laboratory.', ' Ability to think independently, plan, and execute applied research, interpret data, and communicate results.', 'Pre-Employment Drug Test:', ' Evaluate cell performance with electrochemical techniques, including cycle performance testing and rate performance testing.', 'Work by Glassdoor!', ' Ability to develop independent research projects through publication of peer-reviewed literature.', 'Desired Qualifications', ' Familiarity with porous materials, such as porous polymers, porous carbons, intercalation compounds, metal-organic frameworks, or covalent organic frameworks, etc.', 'Note: ', '2020 Best Places to ', 'Join us and make YOUR mark on the World!', ' Familiarity with diffusivity measurements, such as lithium ion diffusion.', ' Experience in electrochemistry, including cyclic voltammetry and electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.', 'Essential Duties', 'About Us', ' Document research and analyze data; publish papers in peer-reviewed journals and disseminate key results within the DOE community and at conferences.', 'Qualifications', ' Familiarity with characterization of porous materials, such as porosimetry or surface area analysis.', ' Design improvements to cell materials and assemblies based on measured properties and performance.', ' Collaborate with scientists in a multidisciplinary team environment to accomplish research goals.', ' Strong desire to work in applied research and in a multidisciplinary team environment.', ' Proficient verbal and written communication skills as reflected in effective presentations at seminars, meetings and/or teaching lectures.', ' Perform other duties as assigned.', ' Experience with fabrication, testing, or design of devices and materials for energy storage.']

['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong analytical skills, experience with Python and R', 'Preferred Qualifications', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent oral and writing skills', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Opportunities for personal and professional growth as our company expands.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Self-motivated, highly disciplined, and passionate about bringing the right therapeutics to the right patients', 'ReviveMed is an MIT spinout, artificial intelligence (AI)-driven drug discovery platform by uniquely leveraging data form small molecules or metabolites in the human body. Located in the heart of biotech innovation in Cambridge, ReviveMed uniquely overcomes the difficulties of identifying a large set of metabolites for each patient, based on technology that our team developed at MIT and published in Nature Methods. Our AI platform further combines the data from small molecules with other molecular data, and translates these data into novel therapeutic insights for drug discovery. Currently, ReviveMed is collaborating with tier-one pharmaceutical companies and pursuing internal drug discovery, initially focused on metabolic diseases, including non-alcoholic fatty liver.', 'We are an award-winning enthusiastic team, passionate about innovative, data-driven approaches to bring the right therapeutics for the right patients, and ultimately save millions of lives.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Making an impact on the world with every line of code.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Involvement in critical partnerships projects with pharmaceutical clients.', 'We are looking for an exceptional deep learning data scientist to join our exceptional team. We have a fast-paced, high-performance, and result-oriented culture, looking for candidates hungry for learning. The preferred candidate will bring relevant experience, entrepreneurial drive, and a passion for advancing our vision.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Competitive compensation, health insurance, as well as share options.', 'The Role', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Extensive experience analyzing “-omic” data, specifically metabolomic data', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0An opportunity to become part of a transformational approach to drug discovery and development from the beginning.', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ph.D. in systems biology, computational biology, biological engineering, biomedical engineering, bioinformatics or related fields.', 'Why you should join ReviveMed']

across the following four areas:Product Operations: Forecasting and setting product team goals, designing and evaluating experiments, monitoring key product metrics, understanding root causes of changes in metrics, building and analyzing dashboards and reports, building key data sets to empower operational and exploratory analysis, and evaluating and defining metricsExploratory Analysis: proposing what to build in the next roadmap, understanding ecosystems, user behaviors, and long-term trends, identifying new levers to help move key metric, and building models of user behaviors for detection methods and propose enhancements as needed\xa0', 'Occasional travel to customer site as necessary\xa0', 'We also offer flexible PTO and some WFH opportunities as needed.', 'The product platform organization is responsible for the overall fraud and abuse protection product strategy. The focus of the team is to define the product requirements, research the best way to defend against the threat vectors and architect the product to meet the following key requirements: Detection: Detect automated and human fraud / abuse through various methods with high accuracy. The detection must be tightly integrated with the challenge framework so as to adopt the most effective response strategy depending on the risk associated with the request session. The challenge framework is managed by Matt Ford’s Product Challenge organization. Visibility: provide a set of dashboard and reports to customers, partner and our support team to allow them to visualize and analyze the fraud activity detected by the product Serviceability: provide customers the ability tune the detection and response strategy based on the risk score. Also provide customers the ability to craft custom logic to meet their own requirements. The product platform consists of technical product managers and the product research team. The product research team is responsible for coming up with different ways to process data collected on a session in order to differentiate bot from human traffic but also detect human fraud within the human traffic. The team may use different techniques including but not limited to statistical model, unsupervised learning, supervised learning, deep learning, whichever model is the most effective to meet the accuracy requirements.', 'A Bachelor or Masters Degree in a highly quantitative field (Computer Science, Machine Learning, Operational Research, Statistics, Mathematics, etc.) or equivalent experience\xa0']

job_title: Data Scientist Associate Sr. - CCB ML & AI
job_text: ['', ' Chase: ', ' Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence (MLAI) Garage: ', ' Experience across broad range of modern data science and analytics tools (e.g., SQL, Hive, Hadoop, Spark, Python, R) ', ' CCB Data & Analytics: ', ' Experience of leading teams with a proven track record of being driving value for the business; ', ' Position Overview ', " 4+ years of industry hands on experience in leveraging advanced data science (including ML) and business analytics to solve business problems   Bachelor's degree in relevant quantitative field required, advanced degree preferred in analytical field (e.g. Statistics, Economics, Applied Math, Operations Research, other Data Science fields)   Thought leader in data science and/or analytics who can help the business define their business problem, create solutions to address it, plan and execute the implementation   Expert knowledge in quantitative methods for business, advanced data science and ML   Familiarity with Agile, experience with Agile is a plus   Experience in practical data processing working with Large scale datasets and Big Data environment, data mining, text mining and information retrieval   Experience across broad range of modern data science and analytics tools (e.g., SQL, Hive, Hadoop, Spark, Python, R)   Proficiency in SQL and Python or R required.   Ability to work in large and medium sized project teams, as self-directed contributor with a proven track record of being detail orientated, innovative, creative, and strategic   Excellent communicator able to convey complex information in an understandable, compelling, and persuasive manner at all levels   Experience of leading teams with a proven track record of being driving value for the business;   Financial services background preferred, but not required  ", 'Data Scientist Sr. Associate (AI/ML)', ' Chase Consumer & Community Bank (CCB) ', ' Expert knowledge in quantitative methods for business, advanced data science and ML ', ' Responsibilities: ', ' Qualifications and Required Skills ', ' Thought leader in data science and/or analytics who can help the business define their business problem, create solutions to address it, plan and execute the implementation ', ' Financial services background preferred, but not required ', ' Proficiency in SQL and Python or R required. ', ' Ability to work in large and medium sized project teams, as self-directed contributor with a proven track record of being detail orientated, innovative, creative, and strategic ', ' Familiarity with Agile, experience with Agile is a plus ', " Bachelor's degree in relevant quantitative field required, advanced degree preferred in analytical field (e.g. Statistics, Economics, Applied Math, Operations Research, other Data Science fields) ", ' 4+ years of industry hands on experience in leveraging advanced data science (including ML) and business analytics to solve business problems ', ' Excellent communicator able to convey complex information in an understandable, compelling, and persuasive manner at all levels ', ' Experience in practical data processing working with Large scale datasets and Big Data environment, data mining, text mining and information retrieval ']

job_title: Sr. Research Scientist I - Chemical Development, Fermentation & Biotransformation
job_text: ['', ' AMRI provides global contract research and manufacturing services to the pharmaceutical and biotechnology industries. ', 'SENIOR RESEARCH SCIENTIST I-CHEMICAL DEVELOPMENT, FERMENTATION & BIOTRANSFORMATION in Albany, NY ', ' Other pertinent training/courses', ' Supervise the work of assigned scientists.This includes the responsibility for the appropriate motivation, education, efficiency, evaluation, and productivity of the scientists.', ' Apply a wide range of analytical techniques to measure and characterize reaction and purity profiles. Develop and maintain working knowledge of commonly used spectroscopic and chromatographic procedures.', 'Organization', 'Shift Type', 'Job Posting', 'Job', 'Primary Location', 'Qualifications And Background To Be Successful In This Role', ' Chemical Hygiene Training', ' Keep a routine flow of quality ideas for achieving target compounds.This will be evident by the level of productivity in the group.', 'Schedule', ' Ph.D. in Organic Chemistry, enzymology or related area', 'In This Role, You Will', ' Provide specific technical expertise to execute internal and external projects in the areas of synthetic bio catalysis, route development, and metabolite synthesis.', ' 3-7 years Postgraduate experience with a strong background in synthetic techniques and separation/analytical methods.', ' Thorough knowledge and Experience in conducting natural product biotransformations and/or biocatalytic reactions is highly desirable', ' Particular focus on bench execution of synthetic strategies with ability to cross train on whole cell biotransformation and PQS separations/analyticalwork', ' Carry out an active program of research in biocatalytic and chemical synthesis, purification of product compounds, and development of new services related to Group capabilities.', ' Keep contemporary, accurate, legible, and complete experimental records in accordance with GMP and GLP practices.', ' Publish scientific work, maintain useful external contacts, and participate in professional societies in a manner, which will bring forth useful information and enhance the scientific reputation of the Senior Scientist and the Company.']

['', 'About Algorex Health', 'Algorex Health data engineers are tasked with a cross-section of responsibilities including programming, architecting and implementing cloud infrastructure, data-modelling, designing and implementing data pipelines, and even data analysis and model development.\xa0Algorex Health data engineers will work with the following technologies:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Docker', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Amazon Web Services (EC2, VPC, Cognito, S3, Route53)', 'directly', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work closely with Program Design, Data Science, and Product teams to understand existing and new business needs', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0General proficiency with Python (preferred), or any of Go, or Java', 'What you will do', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Implement strong security guarantees on data both at rest and in transit, with an eye toward compliance and ease-of-use', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong knowledge of Unix and Posix toolsets', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0SQL', 'What we’re looking for', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0An eagerness to understand data at all levels of abstraction', 'Alternate names: Senior Engineer', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Commitment to understanding the healthcare industry and related data, including data security needs\xa0', 'Algorex Health is currently hiring. If you think that Algorex Health might be the company for you, feel free to send a resume and cover letter\xa0directly\xa0to\xa0recruiting@algorexhealth.com', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Program in Python to drive our pipeline from data ingestion through running performant models (balancing resources like CPU/memory/disk)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Willingness and capacity to independently learn new software engineering, data science and infrastructure skills', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Linux (Bash scripting, sed, awk, Make, cron, etc.)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Elixir (a growing product is implemented in Elixir using Phoenix LiveView and Postgres)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0High autonomy on technical projects with multiple stakeholders', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Architecture, both from a Software perspective to a Cloud Infrastructure perspective (modelling networks in Amazon VPC to deciding boundaries of batch and server software components)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with multiple programming languages across multiple paradigms (functional, logical, imperative, etc.)', '\xa0Algorex Health moves fast to deliver value to our clients and needs to process many types of health care data including rosters, claims files, and census geo-data (shapefiles).\xa0As such, a data engineer needs to be able to program at all levels of abstraction, from troubleshooting SSH connections, to hex-analyzing data files for corrupt data, to developing CloudFormation and Ansible scripts for re-usable server infrastructure, to writing libraries to geocode and geojoin geographic entities, to designing data models for new and to-de-developed machine learning models.\xa0Algorex Health is still a growing company and responsibilities are shared between client-focused teams requiring analysis and visualization and “back-end” work that supports the entire company.\xa0A background in statistics and data science is a strong plus, and growth back and forth between the engineering and data science teams is expected and encouraged.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa04 to 8 years working experience in engineering and/or analytics/data science or related master’s degree', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong knowledge of software engineering practices (from source control, to QA, to continuous integration)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Python (from data cleansing pipelines to productionalizing Pandas and SciPy models to contributing to data science notebooks)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Sqlite and Postgres (strong SQL skills up to and including analytic windowing functions and spatial queries)', 'Senior Data Engineer Job Description', '\xa0', 'Technical Requirements', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Ability to clearly and confidently communicate engineering choices to a non-technical audience', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Research and integrate new data sources into the ML pipeline', 'Algorex Health is a data science- and advanced analytics- as-a-service company. The company enables value-based care organizations to make the most from data and health IT through a combination of open technology, pre-licensed data sets, and purpose-built algorithms. We enable organizations to deploy big-technology consumer marketing strategies across all elements of their business.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Cloud Infrastructure', 'Only applicants who submit a cover letter and resume will be considered.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Assist the Data Science team in building, testing, and validating machine learning models using a disparate set of healthcare and consumer data sources', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A bias towards action in tackling new and unsolved problems (from networking, data, programming and troubleshooting)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design relational data models (understanding of trade-offs of the different normal forms)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Write and tune SQL queries both on Sqlite and Postgres (understanding of benefits and trade-offs of indexing and low-level storage strategies)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Strong communication skills to diagram and document engineering choices to build the foundation for a larger team', 'The Position']

job_title: Manager, Clinical Data Sciences (Clinical Data Management)
job_text: ['', 'Coordinate all tasks within the data science process between different team members from database development to database lock; prepare data science plans, data entry guidelines, data science reports and other documents required for preparing and completing databases; support database development activities and coordinates database amendments in collaboration with the database development team', 'You’ll Need This To Be Considered', 'Bachelor’s degree (post graduate degree preferred), preferably in a Life Science along with 8-12 years mastery in Data Management experience, including 3-7 years of supervisory/management experienceProven experience working across Clinical Data Management Systems and in-depth knowledge of at least one, preferably Medidata Rave and DataLabs EDCFamiliar with all phases of a study, e.g., pre-award, study startup/database setup, maintenance, and lock; working knowledge of data mining and the application of data standards as well as statistical principles and analysisSelf-starter with common sense and ability to act on own initiativeAccountable, dependable and strong commitmentApplies clear and consistent performance standards and handles problems decisively and objectivelyCustomer service focused in approach to work, both internally and externallyMaintains a positive, results orientated work environmentStrong presentation skills and communication skills, both written and verbal', 'Provide leadership as you’ll directly manage a team of Data Scientists and other Clinical Data Sciences staff; interview, onboard, train, and evaluate new employees to facilitate integration into the department and to be successful contributors to our team. Mentor and support team with feedback, annual appraisals, and professional developmentSupport department management in resource planning and allocation and achievement of department financial goals; provide oversight of data management project progress and financial status including resolution plans for unexpected challengesServe as primary Clinical Data Sciences contact in assigned studies and ensure that data cleaning is performed consistently among the teamCoordinate all tasks within the data science process between different team members from database development to database lock; prepare data science plans, data entry guidelines, data science reports and other documents required for preparing and completing databases; support database development activities and coordinates database amendments in collaboration with the database development teamRepresent Clinical Data Sciences in audits/inspections, corporate initiatives and Business Development activitiesParticipate in process improvement initiatives including SOP writing and revisions', 'Self-starter with common sense and ability to act on own initiative', 'Support department management in resource planning and allocation and achievement of department financial goals; provide oversight of data management project progress and financial status including resolution plans for unexpected challenges', 'Customer service focused in approach to work, both internally and externally', 'Familiar with all phases of a study, e.g., pre-award, study startup/database setup, maintenance, and lock; working knowledge of data mining and the application of data standards as well as statistical principles and analysis', 'Accountable, dependable and strong commitment', 'Manager, Data Management and Clinical Data Sciences', 'Represent Clinical Data Sciences in audits/inspections, corporate initiatives and Business Development activities']

job_title: CIB - User Experience Researcher, Vice President
job_text: ['', ' Ability to quickly build strong relationships and manage strong ongoing communications with individuals who are willing to participate in an ongoing research program. ', " Bachelor's degree in Human Factors / Ergonomics, Human-Computer Interaction, Cognitive / Experimental Psychology, or similarly relevant field (Master's/ Doctorate preferred) ", ' Strong awareness of both Service Design and User Experience Design and able to plan research studies that can gather insights appropriate to each. ', ' Lead and conduct contextual user interviews, synthesizing insights, delivering Insight Reports through contexts most likely to inform decision making ', ' Propose and implement quantitative research methodologies that harness existing data relating to user behavior, report this in a manner that drives work prioritization and creates a continuous feedback loop that seeks to refine the quality of data sourced. ', ' Guide product and design teams in embracing and utilizing user research throughout the development lifecycle. ', ' Review and guide User Research project proposals ', ' Responsibilities: ', ' Manage domain user research to accelerate reuse and time to insight ', " 5-7+ years of experience in User Research, preferred experience in financial industry   Bachelor's degree in Human Factors / Ergonomics, Human-Computer Interaction, Cognitive / Experimental Psychology, or similarly relevant field (Master's/ Doctorate preferred)   Experience managing portfolio of exploratory and confirmatory User Research studies   Ability to quickly build strong relationships and manage strong ongoing communications with individuals who are willing to participate in an ongoing research program.   Energetic and responsive personality with excellent communication and interpersonal skills   Strong awareness of both Service Design and User Experience Design and able to plan research studies that can gather insights appropriate to each.   Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a dynamic, hands-on and creative environment   Working knowledge of organizational culture and design   Enthusiasm in utilizing a diverse set of approaches to creative problem solving  ", ' Comfortable with managing User Research in a design thinking environment ', ' Working knowledge of organizational culture and design ', ' Enthusiasm in utilizing a diverse set of approaches to creative problem solving ', ' Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a dynamic, hands-on and creative environment ', ' Energetic and responsive personality with excellent communication and interpersonal skills ', ' Manage User Research requests from across the organization, proactively proposing mechanisms by which demands can be met ', ' Balance and prioritize level of User Research project engagement across large portfolio of opportunities based on assessment of probable value and impact ', ' Qualifications: ', ' Balance and prioritize level of User Research project engagement across large portfolio of opportunities based on assessment of probable value and impact   Review and guide User Research project proposals   Lead facilitation, workshopping and brainstorming with all partners   Comfortable with managing User Research in a design thinking environment   Lead and conduct contextual user interviews, synthesizing insights, delivering Insight Reports through contexts most likely to inform decision making   Propose and implement quantitative research methodologies that harness existing data relating to user behavior, report this in a manner that drives work prioritization and creates a continuous feedback loop that seeks to refine the quality of data sourced.   Guide product and design teams in embracing and utilizing user research throughout the development lifecycle.   Manage User Research requests from across the organization, proactively proposing mechanisms by which demands can be met   Manage domain user research to accelerate reuse and time to insight  ', ' Lead facilitation, workshopping and brainstorming with all partners ', ' Experience managing portfolio of exploratory and confirmatory User Research studies ', ' 5-7+ years of experience in User Research, preferred experience in financial industry ']

required', 'Experience', 'Remote', 'Work collaboratively with other engineers, data scientists, analytics teams, and business product owners in an agile environment:', 'Prior experience in financial reporting software development or within finance industry is desired', 'Project', 'Lead the development of data APIs and data delivery services to support critical operational processes, analytical models and machine learning applications.', 'Data Engineer', 'Architect, build, and support the operation of Cloud and On-Premises enterprise data infrastructure and tools.', 'Assist the selection and integration of data related tools, frameworks and applications required to expand platform capabilities.', 'Database Design Tools and Data Modeling: Ralph-Kimball Methodology, Star Schema, Snow Flake Schema, Extended Star Schema are nice to have', 'OLAP cubes using SQL Server Analysis Services is nice to have', 'Design robust, reusable and scalable data driven solutions and data pipeline frameworks to automate the ingestion, processing and delivery of both structured and unstructured batch and real-time streaming data.', 'Responsibilities', ' Work collaboratively with other engineers, data scientists, analytics teams, and business product owners in an agile environment: Architect, build, and support the operation of Cloud and On-Premises enterprise data infrastructure and tools. ['You will spend your day examining global markets and utilizing terabytes of trading data to build models and strategies for a variety of financial instruments. By leveraging your quantitative and computational abilities, you will play a key role in increasing the firm’s profitability.', 'Experience working on in-depth research projects', 'An open minded approach to solving complex problems', 'Past hires have primarily come from within the financial industry (mainly buy-side), national research labs, and occasionally straight from academia (either direct from PhD, relevant internships, or a postdoc).', 'Exceptional problem-solving skills', 'Strong practical computing skills in Python, C++, R and/or Matlab', 'Top proprietary trading firm based in the New York area is looking to hire an experienced PhD Quant Researcher to join the team. Having built most of their own trading technology from scratch, this firm is a leader in the systematic trading space. You will be joining a team of PhD-level analysts dedicated to the data-driven development and improvement of trading models utilising advanced machine learning frameworks to carry out alpha/signal research in global markets.', 'PhD or equivalent degree in Mathematics, Physics, Statistics, Operations Research, Machine Learning or a related discipline2 to 7 years of experience post-PhD.Strong practical computing skills in Python, C++, R and/or MatlabExceptional problem-solving skillsExperience working on in-depth research projectsDemonstrated experience working with and drawing conclusions from large datasetsAn open minded approach to solving complex problems', 'Compensation is unprecedented and dependent on experience.', 'PhD or equivalent degree in Mathematics, Physics, Statistics, Operations Research, Machine Learning or a related discipline', "What we're looking for", '2 to 7 years of experience post-PhD.', 'Demonstrated experience working with and drawing conclusions from large datasets', '\xa0', 'Having tried and tested different approaches, the firm has committed to a collaborative environment that will enable you to work closely with traders and developers, making the impact of your work visible from day one. This will enable your involvement in day-to-day discussions that shape the firm’s trading activities and transform quantitative methods into trading opportunities.']

job_title: CIB - User Experience Researcher, Vice President
job_text: ['', ' Ability to quickly build strong relationships and manage strong ongoing communications with individuals who are willing to participate in an ongoing research program. ', " Bachelor's degree in Human Factors / Ergonomics, Human-Computer Interaction, Cognitive / Experimental Psychology, or similarly relevant field (Master's/ Doctorate preferred) ", ' Strong awareness of both Service Design and User Experience Design and able to plan research studies that can gather insights appropriate to each. ', ' Lead and conduct contextual user interviews, synthesizing insights, delivering Insight Reports through contexts most likely to inform decision making ', ' Propose and implement quantitative research methodologies that harness existing data relating to user behavior, report this in a manner that drives work prioritization and creates a continuous feedback loop that seeks to refine the quality of data sourced. ', ' Guide product and design teams in embracing and utilizing user research throughout the development lifecycle. ', ' Review and guide User Research project proposals ', ' Responsibilities: ', ' Manage domain user research to accelerate reuse and time to insight ', " 5-7+ years of experience in User Research, preferred experience in financial industry   Bachelor's degree in Human Factors / Ergonomics, Human-Computer Interaction, Cognitive / Experimental Psychology, or similarly relevant field (Master's/ Doctorate preferred)   Experience managing portfolio of exploratory and confirmatory User Research studies   Ability to quickly build strong relationships and manage strong ongoing communications with individuals who are willing to participate in an ongoing research program.   Energetic and responsive personality with excellent communication and interpersonal skills   Strong awareness of both Service Design and User Experience Design and able to plan research studies that can gather insights appropriate to each.   Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a dynamic, hands-on and creative environment   Working knowledge of organizational culture and design   Enthusiasm in utilizing a diverse set of approaches to creative problem solving  ", ' Comfortable with managing User Research in a design thinking environment ', ' Working knowledge of organizational culture and design ', ' Enthusiasm in utilizing a diverse set of approaches to creative problem solving ', ' Ability to work both independently and collaboratively in a dynamic, hands-on and creative environment ', ' Energetic and responsive personality with excellent communication and interpersonal skills ', ' Manage User Research requests from across the organization, proactively proposing mechanisms by which demands can be met ', ' Balance and prioritize level of User Research project engagement across large portfolio of opportunities based on assessment of probable value and impact ', ' Qualifications: ', ' Balance and prioritize level of User Research project engagement across large portfolio of opportunities based on assessment of probable value and impact   Review and guide User Research project proposals   Lead facilitation, workshopping and brainstorming with all partners   Comfortable with managing User Research in a design thinking environment   Lead and conduct contextual user interviews, synthesizing insights, delivering Insight Reports through contexts most likely to inform decision making   Propose and implement quantitative research methodologies that harness existing data relating to user behavior, report this in a manner that drives work prioritization and creates a continuous feedback loop that seeks to refine the quality of data sourced.   Guide product and design teams in embracing and utilizing user research throughout the development lifecycle.   Manage User Research requests from across the organization, proactively proposing mechanisms by which demands can be met   Manage domain user research to accelerate reuse and time to insight  ', ' Lead facilitation, workshopping and brainstorming with all partners ', ' Experience managing portfolio of exploratory and confirmatory User Research studies ', ' 5-7+ years of experience in User Research, preferred experience in financial industry ']

['', 'Security Clearance: ', ' Pursue independent but complementary research interests and interact with a broad spectrum of scientists internally and externally to the Laboratory.', ' Development of models for assessing reactive sites and reaction rates that govern relevant structure-function relationships.', ' Initiative and interpersonal skills with desire and ability to work in a collaborative, multidisciplinary team environment.', ' Experience with methods for free energy sampling, global minimization, and/or complex optimization.', ' Ability as an innovative theorist with a broad range of experience in ab initio codes, data acquisition, and data analysis methodologies.¿', 'Pre-Employment Drug Test:', ' Knowledge of the concepts of density functional theory and first-principles molecular dynamics simulations.', ' Compute free energies and kinetic barriers that govern interfacial chemical reactions and transport processes.', ' Experience with the application of machine learning methods to problems of relevance in materials science.', 'Work by Glassdoor!', 'Desired Qualifications', 'Note: ', '2020 Best Places to ', ' Contribute to and actively participate in the conception, design, and execution of research to address defined problems.', ' Experience in the application of first-principles simulations to one or more of the following areas: heterogeneous catalysis, polymer degradation, ion transport, solid-liquid and/or solid-solid interfaces.', 'Join us and make YOUR mark on the World!', 'Essential Duties', 'About Us', 'Qualifications', ' Collaborate with scientists in a multidisciplinary team environment to accomplish research goals.', ' Ability to develop independent research projects documented through publication of peer-reviewed literature.', ' Proficient verbal and written communication skills as reflected in effective presentations at seminars, meetings and/or teaching lectures.', ' Document research; publish papers in peer-reviewed journals, and present results within the DOE community and at conferences.', ' Perform other duties as assigned.']

job_title: Manager, Clinical Data Sciences (Clinical Data Management)
job_text: ['', 'Coordinate all tasks within the data science process between different team members from database development to database lock; prepare data science plans, data entry guidelines, data science reports and other documents required for preparing and completing databases; support database development activities and coordinates database amendments in collaboration with the database development team', 'You’ll Need This To Be Considered', 'Bachelor’s degree (post graduate degree preferred), preferably in a Life Science along with 8-12 years mastery in Data Management experience, including 3-7 years of supervisory/management experienceProven experience working across Clinical Data Management Systems and in-depth knowledge of at least one, preferably Medidata Rave and DataLabs EDCFamiliar with all phases of a study, e.g., pre-award, study startup/database setup, maintenance, and lock; working knowledge of data mining and the application of data standards as well as statistical principles and analysisSelf-starter with common sense and ability to act on own initiativeAccountable, dependable and strong commitmentApplies clear and consistent performance standards and handles problems decisively and objectivelyCustomer service focused in approach to work, both internally and externallyMaintains a positive, results orientated work environmentStrong presentation skills and communication skills, both written and verbal', 'Provide leadership as you’ll directly manage a team of Data Scientists and other Clinical Data Sciences staff; interview, onboard, train, and evaluate new employees to facilitate integration into the department and to be successful contributors to our team. job_title: Research Scientist I - Antibody Engineering & Phage Display
job_text: ['', 'Skunkworx Bio (SKWX)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa02+ years with antibody development ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Gene sequence/codon optimization', 'Experience in one or more areas of computational biology is a plus:', 'Research Scientist I – Antibody Engineering & Phage Display', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Developing, optimizing and applying pipelines and algorithms for processing and analyzing biological data', 'Responsibilities (90% wet/lab work; 10% reporting)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa02-5 years of industry or academia experience', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Phenotypic data analysis', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Gene expression analysis, RNA-seq, microarray, proteomics', 'This position will require significant independent thinking and functioning.\xa0A successful candidate must be highly organized, self-motivated, and able to thrive in a fast-paced dynamic biotech environment where flexibility, tolerability to rapid change, and drive to make a significant impact, are essential.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Understand and apply statistical analysis methods', 'Requirements', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design, set-up or manage antibody engineering projects using phage display, peptide screens or other techniques', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Interface with our North Carolina-based, Heat Biologics corporate HQ site, and other scientists at various partners, for the qualification of new products for commercial manufacturing and clinical use ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Generation of technical reports, manuscripts, abstracts, presentations, and other forms of deliverables as required', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Must have experience with plasmid design, construction, transfection, PCR, cloning, extraction of genomic DNA, sequencing, analysis', 'Skunkworx Bio is a drug discovery powerhouse obsessed with building better, safer therapeutics for major unmet medical needs.\xa0We believe our proprietary platforms and multifaceted biological entities will redefine current approaches in the treatment of various diseases including cancer and autoimmunity. SKWX is an innovative and growing company and have a highly energized and accomplished team with over two decades of innovative drug design experience.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Sequence related analysis, next generation sequence data analysis (NGS)', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Conducting independent data analysis and interpretation and generating reports as per specification', 'We are seeking a highly motivated genetic engineering & phage display, PhD-level scientist for the role of Research Scientist I. The position will be based in North Brunswick, New Jersey and will directly report to the Scientific Director & Lab Head.\xa0SKWX is a small start-up looking for an ambitious candidate eager to work in a fast-paced environment. ', 'Position Information', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Good written and verbal communication and interpersonal communication skills to effectively interact with all levels both within and outside the company is key', 'This individual will be required to engineer new biological entities to screen, clone and develop with multiple partners.\xa0Practical, ‘out-of-the-box’ thinking is required.\xa0Inventing new techniques and applying genetic engineering and editing methods to build highly complex protein products.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Analyze, graph and report results, plus interface with outside vendors (commercial and academic) ', 'We offer a competitive compensation and benefits package as well as an environment where your contributions can make a significant difference.', '\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa04+ years technical experience with mammalian cell culture and molecular biology techniques as it relates to this job description\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Help design peptides and antibodies for commercial and clinical implementation', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Involved in genome sequence analysis, assembly and annotations leveraging information and knowledge creation from diverse genomics datasets and computational tools', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa04+ years of experience with display libraries and site directed gene editing techniques', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Pathway and gene functional analysis', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Network analysis/modeling approaches', 'Experience with cloning (phage, bacterial, mammalian), display libraries (peptide and antibody), sequencing and general molecular biology, required.\xa0Familiarity with immunology, immuno-oncology, tumor biology and techniques (e.g., flow cytometry, ELISA) a plus but not required.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0PhD in molecular biology, genetic engineering, or gene editing', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Genome sequence analysis, assembly and annotation']

['', ' Experience building/operating highly available, distributed systems of data extraction, ingestion, and processing of large data sets * Experience building data products incrementally and integrating and managing datasets from multiple sources * Experience leading large-scale data warehousing and analytics projects, including using AWS technologies – Redshift, S3, EC2, Data-pipeline and other big data technologies * Experience providing technical leadership and mentor other engineers for the best practices on the data engineering space * Experience using machine learning and statistical tools such as Python/Pandas, R etc . * Linux/UNIX including to process large data sets.', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' A desire to work in a collaborative, intellectually curious environment. * Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Physics, or a related field and at least 4 years work experience * Industry experience as a Data Engineer or related specialty (e.g., Software Engineer, Business Intelligence Engineer, Data Scientist) with a track record of manipulating, processing, and extracting value from large datasets. * Demonstrated ability in data modeling, ETL development, and data warehousing. * Experience with Oracle, Redshift, Teradata, etc. * Experience with Big Data Technologies (Hadoop, Hive, Hbase, Pig, Spark, etc.) * Coding proficiency in at least one modern programming language (Python, Ruby, Java, etc)', 'Description', 'Company', 'Basic Qualifications']

job_title: Sr. Research Scientist (Electron Optics|LabVIEW|Software Algorithms|Image Processing)
job_text: ['', 'We offer a competitive, family friendly total rewards package. We design our programs to reflect our commitment to an inclusive environment, while ensuring we provide benefits that meet the diverse needs of our employees. ', ' This individual will use his/her skills in systems engineering, electronics, algorithms, and software to develop, improve, document, and support system diagnostics and calibration software to be integrated into Product 8xx. Participate in some Project 8xx Meetings, specifically concerning EBeam Column Tuning algorithms; EBeam Diagnostic software tool design, test, integration, and debugging; and software interfaces to electro-optic controls and image processing algorithms. Analyze image data and algorithm results to test, debug, and verify successful integration of Project 8xx EBeam Column Calibration software tools. Document 8xx Diagnostics software as-written, and develop new documents including new designs as needed to resolve calibration tuning technical challenges that may arise. Documents specifically will include Software Requirements Specifications, Excel Spreadsheet tables and analyses, and PowerPoint presentations explaining the software design concepts and strategies. Participate in or lead document and design Review meetings to refine and improve designs and documentation. General consulting concerning all of the above, especially as-written 8xx Diagnostic software and already-written Software Requirements and design documents.', ' Document 8xx Diagnostics software as-written, and develop new documents including new designs as needed to resolve calibration tuning technical challenges that may arise. Documents specifically will include Software Requirements Specifications, Excel Spreadsheet tables and analyses, and PowerPoint presentations explaining the software design concepts and strategies.', ' 5+ years of research lab experience with electron beam optics and beam metrology', ' Excellent communication, including highly-practiced PowerPoint presentation skills.', 'KLA is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, sex, gender identity, gender expression, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status or any other status protected by applicable law. We will ensure that qualified individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us at talent.acquisition@kla.com to request accommodation.', ' 3+ years of professional developer experience with LabVIEW software language, and familiarity with Object-Oriented LabVIEW Actor Framework', ' Knowledge of and laboratory exposure to electrical, mechanical and optical measurement instruments', ' Participate in or lead document and design Review meetings to refine and improve designs and documentation.', ' This individual will use his/her skills in systems engineering, electronics, algorithms, and software to develop, improve, document, and support system diagnostics and calibration software to be integrated into Product 8xx.', ' Hands on development in semiconductor business', ' 3+ years of experience with large-scale object-oriented software design.', 'Minimum Qualifications', ' General consulting concerning all of the above, especially as-written 8xx Diagnostic software and already-written Software Requirements and design documents.', ' PhD in applied physics, electrical engineering, optical engineering, or equivalent Hands on development in semiconductor business Knowledge of Python or other scripting language', ' PhD in applied physics, electrical engineering, optical engineering, or equivalent', ' 5+ years of professional experience with algorithms including image processing techniques, non-linear optimization methods (Levenberg-Marquardt, etc.), and statistical analysis of large data sets.', ' Participate in some Project 8xx Meetings, specifically concerning EBeam Column Tuning algorithms; EBeam Diagnostic software tool design, test, integration, and debugging; and software interfaces to electro-optic controls and image processing algorithms.', ' 3+ years of experience with large-scale object-oriented software design. Excellent design, analytical, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills. 5+ years of research lab experience with electron beam optics and beam metrology Excellent communication, including highly-practiced PowerPoint presentation skills. 3+ years of professional developer experience with LabVIEW software language, and familiarity with Object-Oriented LabVIEW Actor Framework Knowledge of and laboratory exposure to electrical, mechanical and optical measurement instruments 5+ years of professional experience with algorithms including image processing techniques, non-linear optimization methods (Levenberg-Marquardt, etc.), and statistical analysis of large data sets.', ' Group/Division ', ' Knowledge of Python or other scripting language', 'Qualifications', ' Excellent design, analytical, troubleshooting, and problem-solving skills.', ' Analyze image data and algorithm results to test, debug, and verify successful integration of Project 8xx EBeam Column Calibration software tools.', 'Company Overview', 'Preferred But Not Required']

job_title: Analista Senior de Risk Revenue Management - Mercado Envíos
job_text: ['', ' Exponer los resultados obtenidos a los heads del área e interactuar con diferentes equipos de Mercado Libre, como IT, Producto, Transporte, Operaciones, con el objetivo de generar sinergias y mejorar la performance.', 'Te Proponemos', ' Realizar seguimiento de los planes de acción que puedan surgir para atacar la causa raíz de los problemas identificados.', ' Compartir y aprender en equipo junto a grandes profesionales y especialistas.', ' Dan el máximo porque les gusta trabajar con compromiso y dedicación.', ' Tener conocimientos y experiencia en explotación de datos, business data scientist, analytics, como R, Python o similares, es deseable.', ' Viven los cambios como oportunidades y aprenden de sus errores.', 'Requisitos', ' Vibran energía emprendedora: se mueven por la curiosidad, nunca se rinden y se enfocan en superar sus propios límites. Dan el máximo porque les gusta trabajar con compromiso y dedicación. Viven los cambios como oportunidades y aprenden de sus errores. La excelencia y la ejecución son claves en su forma de hacer las cosas. Promueven el buen clima, aportan alegría y diversión. Saben cómo construir con otras personas y disfrutan trabajando en equipo.', ' Saben cómo construir con otras personas y disfrutan trabajando en equipo.', ' Poseer buen manejo de Excel, SQL.', ' Promueven el buen clima, aportan alegría y diversión.', ' Analizar datos disponibles para entender, priorizar y cuantificar los riesgos, y desarrollar controles que lleven a mitigarlos, a partir de Teradata o Near Real Time u otras soluciones tecnológicas.', ' Identificar riesgos e issues que afecten los ingresos o generen mayores costos en los sistemas y procesos de FBM y Billing de Mercado Envíos, como bonificaciones de cargos, Fulfillment Protection Program, performance de los terceros que operan nuestros facilities, stock, cargos por aging y retiros, entre otros.', ' La excelencia y la ejecución son claves en su forma de hacer las cosas.', ' Ser protagonista de tu desarrollo en un ambiente de oportunidades, aprendizaje, crecimiento, expansión y proyectos desafiantes.', ' Ser graduado de carreras como Ingeniería, Economía, Actuario, Estadística o afines.', ' Contar con conocimientos de Tableau o similares, es deseable.', ' Ser parte de una compañía con espíritu emprendedor en la que nos encanta pensar en grande y a largo plazo. Ser protagonista de tu desarrollo en un ambiente de oportunidades, aprendizaje, crecimiento, expansión y proyectos desafiantes. Compartir y aprender en equipo junto a grandes profesionales y especialistas. Un excelente clima de trabajo, con todo lo necesario para que vivas una gran experiencia. :)', ' Un excelente clima de trabajo, con todo lo necesario para que vivas una gran experiencia. :)', ' Identificar riesgos e issues que afecten los ingresos o generen mayores costos en los sistemas y procesos de FBM y Billing de Mercado Envíos, como bonificaciones de cargos, Fulfillment Protection Program, performance de los terceros que operan nuestros facilities, stock, cargos por aging y retiros, entre otros. Analizar datos disponibles para entender, priorizar y cuantificar los riesgos, y desarrollar controles que lleven a mitigarlos, a partir de Teradata o Near Real Time u otras soluciones tecnológicas. Diseñar indicadores del área, alarmados y dashboard de seguimiento, a fin mejorar la toma de decisiones. Realizar seguimiento de los planes de acción que puedan surgir para atacar la causa raíz de los problemas identificados. Exponer los resultados obtenidos a los heads del área e interactuar con diferentes equipos de Mercado Libre, como IT, Producto, Transporte, Operaciones, con el objetivo de generar sinergias y mejorar la performance.', ' Vibran energía emprendedora: se mueven por la curiosidad, nunca se rinden y se enfocan en superar sus propios límites.', ' Ser parte de una compañía con espíritu emprendedor en la que nos encanta pensar en grande y a largo plazo.', 'Tenemos Un Desafío Para Quienes', ' Ser graduado de carreras como Ingeniería, Economía, Actuario, Estadística o afines. Poseer buen manejo de Excel, SQL. Contar con conocimientos de Tableau o similares, es deseable. Tener conocimientos y experiencia en explotación de datos, business data scientist, analytics, como R, Python o similares, es deseable.', ' Diseñar indicadores del área, alarmados y dashboard de seguimiento, a fin mejorar la toma de decisiones.']

job_title: Manager, Clinical Data Sciences (Clinical Data Management)
job_text: ['', 'Coordinate all tasks within the data science process between different team members from database development to database lock; prepare data science plans, data entry guidelines, data science reports and other documents required for preparing and completing databases; support database development activities and coordinates database amendments in collaboration with the database development team', 'You’ll Need This To Be Considered', 'Bachelor’s degree (post graduate degree preferred), preferably in a Life Science along with 8-12 years mastery in Data Management experience, including 3-7 years of supervisory/management experienceProven experience working across Clinical Data Management Systems and in-depth knowledge of at least one, preferably Medidata Rave and DataLabs EDCFamiliar with all phases of a study, e.g., pre-award, study startup/database setup, maintenance, and lock; working knowledge of data mining and the application of data standards as well as statistical principles and analysisSelf-starter with common sense and ability to act on own initiativeAccountable, dependable and strong commitmentApplies clear and consistent performance standards and handles problems decisively and objectivelyCustomer service focused in approach to work, both internally and externallyMaintains a positive, results orientated work environmentStrong presentation skills and communication skills, both written and verbal', 'Provide leadership as you’ll directly manage a team of Data Scientists and other Clinical Data Sciences staff; interview, onboard, train, and evaluate new employees to facilitate integration into the department and to be successful contributors to our team. Mentor and support team with feedback, annual appraisals, and professional development', 'Maintains a positive, results orientated work environment', 'Participate in process improvement initiatives including SOP writing and revisions', 'Strong presentation skills and communication skills, both written and verbal', 'Bachelor’s degree (post graduate degree preferred), preferably in a Life Science along with 8-12 years mastery in Data Management experience, including 3-7 years of supervisory/management experience', 'Serve as primary Clinical Data Sciences contact in assigned studies and ensure that data cleaning is performed consistently among the team', 'Proven experience working across Clinical Data Management Systems and in-depth knowledge of at least one, preferably Medidata Rave and DataLabs EDC', 'Applies clear and consistent performance standards and handles problems decisively and objectively', 'Position at Premier Research Group Limited', 'Description', 'What You’ll Be Doing', 'Provide leadership as you’ll directly manage a team of Data Scientists and other Clinical Data Sciences staff; interview, onboard, train, and evaluate new employees to facilitate integration into the department and to be successful contributors to our team. Mentor and support team with feedback, annual appraisals, and professional developmentSupport department management in resource planning and allocation and achievement of department financial goals; provide oversight of data management project progress and financial status including resolution plans for unexpected challengesServe as primary Clinical Data Sciences contact in assigned studies and ensure that data cleaning is performed consistently among the teamCoordinate all tasks within the data science process between different team members from database development to database lock; prepare data science plans, data entry guidelines, data science reports and other documents required for preparing and completing databases; support database development activities and coordinates database amendments in collaboration with the database development teamRepresent Clinical Data Sciences in audits/inspections, corporate initiatives and Business Development activitiesParticipate in process improvement initiatives including SOP writing and revisions', 'Self-starter with common sense and ability to act on own initiative', 'Support department management in resource planning and allocation and achievement of department financial goals; provide oversight of data management project progress and financial status including resolution plans for unexpected challenges', 'Customer service focused in approach to work, both internally and externally', 'Familiar with all phases of a study, e.g., pre-award, study startup/database setup, maintenance, and lock; working knowledge of data mining and the application of data standards as well as statistical principles and analysis', 'Accountable, dependable and strong commitment', 'Manager, Data Management and Clinical Data Sciences', 'Represent Clinical Data Sciences in audits/inspections, corporate initiatives and Business Development activities']

job_title: Manager, Clinical Data Sciences (Clinical Data Management)
job_text: ['', 'Coordinate all tasks within the data science process between different team members from database development to database lock; prepare data science plans, data entry guidelines, data science reports and other documents required for preparing and completing databases; support database development activities and coordinates database amendments in collaboration with the database development team', 'You’ll Need This To Be Considered', 'Bachelor’s degree (post graduate degree preferred), preferably in a Life Science along with 8-12 years mastery in Data Management experience, including 3-7 years of supervisory/management experienceProven experience working across Clinical Data Management Systems and in-depth knowledge of at least one, preferably Medidata Rave and DataLabs EDCFamiliar with all phases of a study, e.g., pre-award, study startup/database setup, maintenance, and lock; working knowledge of data mining and the application of data standards as well as statistical principles and analysisSelf-starter with common sense and ability to act on own initiativeAccountable, dependable and strong commitmentApplies clear and consistent performance standards and handles problems decisively and objectivelyCustomer service focused in approach to work, both internally and externallyMaintains a positive, results orientated work environmentStrong presentation skills and communication skills, both written and verbal', 'Provide leadership as you’ll directly manage a team of Data Scientists and other Clinical Data Sciences staff; interview, onboard, train, and evaluate new employees to facilitate integration into the department and to be successful contributors to our team.
